original: mi g-yo 'gyur zhes bya ba ni 'gyur ba med par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: mi g-yo 'gyur zhes bya ba ni 'gyur ba med par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: he becomes immutable means that he becomes unchanging,

original: byang chub kyi sems brtan par gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems brtan par gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the bodhicitta becomes stable.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How?

original: bha ga'i dbus su 'ang gsang ba'i bdag / ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: bha ga'i dbus su 'ang gsang ba'i bdag / ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is said, in the center of the bhaga, the lord of the secret.

original: aom tishtha badzra /
analyzed: aom tishtha badzra /
translated: Om tiṣṭha vajra.

original: zhes bsgoms pas byang chub kyi sems zla ba lta bu'i dbus su rdo rje'i rnam par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bsgoms pas byang chub kyi sems zla ba lta bu'i dbus su rdo rje'i rnam par gyur pa'o //
translated: Meditating on this, the bodhicitta becomes the form of a vajra in the center of the moon.

original: de nas aom badzra a'atma ko& ham /
analyzed: de nas aom badzra a'atma ko& ham /
translated: Then, om vajra ātmāko 'ham.

original: zhes bya ba bsgoms pa dang / rnal 'byor pas rdo rje de nyid las nam mkha'i khams khyab pa'i rdo rje phra mo spro ba dang bsdu ba las rdo rje dbyings su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba bsgoms pa dang / rnal 'byor pas rdo rje de nyid las nam mkha'i khams khyab pa'i rdo rje phra mo spro ba dang bsdu ba las rdo rje dbyings su 'gyur ro //
translated: The yogi/ni emanates and reabsorbs subtle vajras pervading the realm of space from that very vajra, and [the vajra] becomes the vajra realm.

original: de nas yang sarba ta th'a ga ta ta th'a aa ham /
analyzed: de nas yang sarba ta th'a ga ta ta th'a aa ham /
translated: Then, meditating on the mantra, Sarva tathāgata tathā ahaṃ,

original: zhes bya ba bsgoms na rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po thob pas de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba bsgoms na rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po thob pas de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro //
translated: one becomes a tathāgata, attaining the great seal of the body of the Tathāgata endowed with the supreme of all aspects.

original: de ltar lnga'i bdag nyid du gyur cing rnam pa lngas yang dag par byung ba'i bdag nyid du bsgoms na g-yo ba med pa ste sems brtan par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar lnga'i bdag nyid du gyur cing rnam pa lngas yang dag par byung ba'i bdag nyid du bsgoms na g-yo ba med pa ste sems brtan par gyur pa'o //
translated: Thus, if one meditates on the nature of the five and the nature of arising from the five aspects, one becomes unwavering, that is, one's mind becomes stable.

original: de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i phyag rgya snying gar bcings la sems dpar byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir snying la gnas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum rdo rje'i tshig gis brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i phyag rgya snying gar bcings la sems dpar byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir snying la gnas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum rdo rje'i tshig gis brjod par bya'o //
translated: Then, having formed the mudra of Vajradhatviśvarī at the heart, one should recite the three verses beginning with “abiding in the heart” with vajra words in order to consecrate the mind.

original: chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni gsum ste /
analyzed: chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni gsum ste /
translated: The nature of phenomena is threefold:

original: kun brtags pa dang / gzhan gyi dbang dang yongs su grub pa'o //
analyzed: kun brtags pa dang / gzhan gyi dbang dang yongs su grub pa'o //
translated: the imagined, the dependent, and the perfected.

original: de la yongs su grub pa ni 'gog pa dang / lam gyi bden pa'i ngo bo nyid du chags pa ste //
analyzed: de la yongs su grub pa ni 'gog pa dang / lam gyi bden pa'i ngo bo nyid du chags pa ste //
translated: Among them, the perfected is the nature of the truths of cessation and path.

original: de rtag tu bsgoms par gyur pa dang / gzhan gyi dbang ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis na ldang ba ste /🔽de la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang / kun brtags @135a * //
analyzed: de rtag tu bsgoms par gyur pa dang / gzhan gyi dbang ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis na ldang ba ste / de la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang / kun brtags @135a * //
translated: The dependent is the nature of the truth of suffering and the truth of origin, which is always cultivated and arises.

original: pa ni 'khrul pa'i sgro btags pa'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i nyon mongs pa ste /
analyzed: pa ni 'khrul pa'i sgro btags pa'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i nyon mongs pa ste /
translated: The imagined is the afflictions of apprehended object and apprehending subject, which are falsely superimposed.

original: de dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not an object of observation because it does not exist.

original: de lta bur gyur pa bsgoms na zhes pa bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis khams gsum po'i bdag po ste /
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa bsgoms na zhes pa bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis khams gsum po'i bdag po ste /
translated: If one meditates on the one who is like that, by the power of meditation, one becomes the lord of the three realms,

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ba'o //
translated: the Bhagavat Buddha.

original: tshigs su bcad pa gsum gsungs pa gang yin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi bden pa ste /
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa gsum gsungs pa gang yin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi bden pa ste /
translated: The three verses that were stated are the truth of the Buddha.

original: 'dis dug bcom mo zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'dis dug bcom mo zhes bya ba ste /
translated: By this, the poison is destroyed.

original: de ltar byas na dug zhi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar byas na dug zhi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the poison is pacified.

original: de ltar na des bskul ba'i dbye bas las thams cad bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na des bskul ba'i dbye bas las thams cad bya ba yin no //
translated: Thus, all actions are to be done by the division of the one who is urged in that way.

original: rang sems zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa bzhi ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i sbyor ba gzhan dag gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: rang sems zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa bzhi ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i sbyor ba gzhan dag gsungs pa yin te /
translated: The four verses beginning with the one that states, “one’s own mind,” teach other applications of pacification, and so on.

original: gti mug sems ni de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: gti mug sems ni de bzhin gshegs //
translated: The mind of delusion is the Tathāgata.

original: zhes bya ba ni zhi ba la mngon par bang chub pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pas rang gi sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bu dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug dang ldan pa ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni zhi ba la mngon par bang chub pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pas rang gi sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bu dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug dang ldan pa ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i
translated: This is the yoga of Vairocana endowed with five manifest enlightenments in peace.🔽The yogi/nī of Vairocana, whose mind is like a moon mandala endowed with the sixteen vowels, is endowed with the five manifest enlightenments in peace.🔽

original: sgrib pa'i sa bon yongs su zad pas /
analyzed: sgrib pa'i sa bon yongs su zad pas /
translated: This is the yoga of Vairochana endowed with the five aspects of manifest enlightenment in peace. The yogin sees his own mind as a moon mandala endowed with the sixteen vowels, and the seeds of the afflictive obstructions and the obstructions to omniscience are completely exhausted.

original: 'od gsal bar mthong ba ni rang gi sems so sor rtog pa yin te /
analyzed: 'od gsal bar mthong ba ni rang gi sems so sor rtog pa yin te /
translated: The seeing of clear light is the discernment of one's own mind.

original: des nyon mongs pa nyid ces bya ba lus dang gnas dang longs spyod nye bar mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: des nyon mongs pa nyid ces bya ba lus dang gnas dang longs spyod nye bar mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: By that, the afflictions are pacified, and the body, abode, and enjoyments are not observed.

original: 'jig rten gyur zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa rnams kyi yang lus la sogs pa mi dmigs pas de'i sems dang rang gi sems gcig tu byas la 'jig rten dang lhan cig tu gyur pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyur zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa rnams kyi yang lus la sogs pa mi dmigs pas de'i sems dang rang gi sems gcig tu byas la 'jig rten dang lhan cig tu gyur pa'o //
translated: The world is transformed means that since the body, etc. are not observed even of the worldly, one's own mind and the mind of the world are made one, and one is transformed together with the world.

original: sems can kun la blta bar bya //
analyzed: sems can kun la blta bar bya //
translated: One should look at all sentient beings.

original: zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba thams cad kyi sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba thams cad kyi sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: The mind of all that is to be accomplished is naturally luminous.

original: zhe sdang sems ni de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: zhe sdang sems ni de bzhin gshegs //
translated: The mind of hatred is the Tathagata.

original: zhes bya ba ni mngon spyod la mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i mi bskyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mngon spyod la mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i mi bskyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas so //
translated: One who is a yogin of Akshobhya endowed with the five aspects of manifest enlightenment in the rite of assault should visualize himself as Akshobhya.

original: phra mo'i ye shes zhes bya ba ni rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la yi ge h'um sngon po phra mo'o //
analyzed: phra mo'i ye shes zhes bya ba ni rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la yi ge h'um sngon po phra mo'o //
translated: The subtle intuition is a subtle blue syllable hum on the moon at his heart.

original: sdang gyur zhes bya ba ni khros pa'i sems su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: sdang gyur zhes bya ba ni khros pa'i sems su gyur pa'o //
translated: The mind of hatred is a mind of anger.

original: rdo rje nyid du gyur zhes bya ba ni yi ge h'um yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje phra mo lta bu'i ye shes 'thob pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje nyid du gyur zhes bya ba ni yi ge h'um yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje phra mo lta bu'i ye shes 'thob pa'o //
translated: The vajra itself is the attainment of the intuition of the subtle vajra from the transformation of the syllable hum.

original: sems can thams cad gzhig par bya ba ni slar gso bar nus pa dag gis rdo rje phra mo 'bar ba spros pas thams cad thams cad khyab par byas nas bsgrub par @135b bya ba brgyal bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad gzhig par bya ba ni slar gso bar nus pa dag gis rdo rje phra mo 'bar ba spros pas thams cad thams cad khyab par byas nas bsgrub par @135b bya ba brgyal bar bya'o //
translated: The destruction of all sentient beings is the fainting of all that is to be accomplished by the emission of the blazing subtle vajra, which pervades everything, by those who are able to revive.

original: 'dod chags sems ni de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: 'dod chags sems ni de bzhin gshegs //
translated: The mind of passion is the Tathagata.

original: zhes bya ba ni dbang du bya ba la mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i 'od dpag tu med pa'i rnal 'byor pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dbang du bya ba la mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i 'od dpag tu med pa'i rnal 'byor pas so //
translated: This is the yoga of Amitabha, endowed with the five enlightenments of the subjugated.

original: byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed //
translated: The thought of enlightenment is truly generated.

original: ces bya ba dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug dang ldan pa'i snying ga'i zla ba la thun mtshams bzhi'am gsum du 'gro ba'i snying po byang chub kyi sems kyi zla ba rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug dang ldan pa'i snying ga'i zla ba la thun mtshams bzhi'am gsum du 'gro ba'i snying po byang chub kyi sems kyi zla ba rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: This is the meditation on the moon of the thought of enlightenment, the essence of the four or three periods, on the moon at the heart, endowed with the sixteen vowels.

original: chags gyur zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba rnams la zhen pa'i sems su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: chags gyur zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba rnams la zhen pa'i sems su gyur pa'o //
translated: The mind of passion is the mind of attachment to the objects of subjugation.

original: bzang po nyid du gyur pa zhes bya ba ni kun du  bzang po nyid do //
analyzed: bzang po nyid du gyur pa zhes bya ba ni kun du  bzang po nyid do //
translated: The state of goodness is the state of Samantabhadra.

original: dbang du bya ba la nus pa thob pa'o //
analyzed: dbang du bya ba la nus pa thob pa'o //
translated: The subjugated are the objects of subjugation.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad chags par bya //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad chags par bya //
translated: All Buddhas are to be subjugated.

original: zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba thams cad dbang du bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba thams cad dbang du bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that all objects of subjugation are to be subjugated.

original: byams pa'i sems ni de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: byams pa'i sems ni de bzhin gshegs //
translated: The mind of love is the Tathagata.

original: zhes bya ba ni rgyas pa la mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rnal 'byor pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rgyas pa la mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rnal 'byor pas so //
translated: This is the yoga of Ratnasaṃbhava, endowed with the five awakenings of the extensive.

original: nga rgyal yang dag bskyed nas ni //
analyzed: nga rgyal yang dag bskyed nas ni //
translated: Having generated pride,

original: zhes bya ba ni snying ga'i zla ba la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rnam par bsams la bdag ni yid bzhin nor bu yin no zhes nga rgyal bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni snying ga'i zla ba la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rnam par bsams la bdag ni yid bzhin nor bu yin no zhes nga rgyal bskyed pa'o //
translated: one should imagine the wish-fulfilling jewel on the moon at the heart and generate the pride, “I am the wish-fulfilling jewel.”🔽Having become a friend,

original: mdza' bor gyur zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba rnams kyi lus rgyas pa'am nor rgyas pa'am tshe rgyas pa ster bar 'dod par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: mdza' bor gyur zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba rnams kyi lus rgyas pa'am nor rgyas pa'am tshe rgyas pa ster bar 'dod par gyur pa'o //
translated: one should wish to bestow the gift of the increase of the bodies, wealth, and life of those to be tamed.🔽Having become all,

original: kun nyid gyur zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i rigs kyi lha rnams spros pa'i gzugs nyid thob pa'o //
analyzed: kun nyid gyur zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i rigs kyi lha rnams spros pa'i gzugs nyid thob pa'o //
translated: one should attain the form of the emanated deities of the jewel family.

original: sangs rgyas kun la 'khyud par bya //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun la 'khyud par bya //
translated: One should embrace all buddhas.

original: zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i rigs kyi lha de rnams nyid dang bsgrub par bya ba de rnams gcig tu bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i rigs kyi lha de rnams nyid dang bsgrub par bya ba de rnams gcig tu bya ba'o //
translated: One should unite those deities of the jewel family and those to be tamed into one.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sbyor ba dag gis ni dang po ste ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes yin par bshad pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sbyor ba dag gis ni dang po ste ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes yin par bshad pa'o //
translated: The first is explained as the gnosis of meditative concentration by the application of cause and effect.

original: gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas ni gnyis pa ste de ni gsang ba'o //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas ni gnyis pa ste de ni gsang ba'o //
translated: The second is by the application of nonduality; that is the secret.

original: ngo bo nyid kyi sbyor bas ni gsum pa ste de ni mchog yin no //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyi sbyor bas ni gsum pa ste de ni mchog yin no //
translated: The third is by the application of the essence; that is the supreme.

original: da ni rab tu dbye ba gnyis kyis mchog tu bshad pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes ba stan par bya ba'i phyir chags pa'i lta bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni rab tu dbye ba gnyis kyis mchog tu bshad pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes ba stan par bya ba'i phyir chags pa'i lta bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Now, in order to teach the gnosis of meditative concentration that is explained as supreme by means of two divisions, [the Bhagavān] declares, through the view of passion, etc.

original: shin tu bde ba nye bar bsdus pa las byung ba'i dga' ba nyid ni chags pa ste /
analyzed: shin tu bde ba nye bar bsdus pa las byung ba'i dga' ba nyid ni chags pa ste /
translated: Passion is the joy that arises from the collection of supreme bliss.

original: des sems can thams cad la blta ba ni byams pa'i spyin pa'o //
analyzed: des sems can thams cad la blta ba ni byams pa'i spyin pa'o //
translated: The view of all sentient beings with that is the gift of love.

original: @136a * // snying rjes de rnams la chos bshad pa ni chos kyi spyin pa'o //
analyzed: @136a * // snying rjes de rnams la chos bshad pa ni chos kyi spyin pa'o //
translated: The explanation of the Dharma to them with compassion is the gift of the Dharma.

original: de rnams 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar bya ba ni mi 'jigs pa'i spyin pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar bya ba ni mi 'jigs pa'i spyin pa'o //
translated: The liberation of them from all fears is the gift of fearlessness.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad la yid kyi rang bzhin gyi mchod pa rnams kyis rjes su mnyes par bya ba ni zang zing gi spyin pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad la yid kyi rang bzhin gyi mchod pa rnams kyis rjes su mnyes par bya ba ni zang zing gi spyin pa'o //
translated: The giving of fearlessness is the giving of protection from fear.🔽The giving of goods is the giving of material things.

original: de bzhin du tshul khrims la sogs pa'i rab tu dbye ba yang lung ji lta ba bzhin du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshul khrims la sogs pa'i rab tu dbye ba yang lung ji lta ba bzhin du shes par bya'o //
translated: The giving of the Dharma is the giving of the Dharma.🔽The giving of fearlessness is the giving of protection from fear.

original: spyin las zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i spyin pa rnam pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bsgoms pas rab tu dga' ste zhes bya ba rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob par yid la lhag par mos pa'o //
analyzed: spyin las zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i spyin pa rnam pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bsgoms pas rab tu dga' ste zhes bya ba rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob par yid la lhag par mos pa'o //
translated: The giving of goods is the giving of material things.🔽The giving of the Dharma is the giving of the Dharma.🔽The giving of fearlessness is the giving of protection from fear.🔽The giving of goods is the giving of material things.🔽The giving of the Dharma is the giving of the Dharma.

original: tshul khrims rnam pa gsum yongs su rdzogs par bsgoms pas ni tshul khrims dang ldan pas dri ma med par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: tshul khrims rnam pa gsum yongs su rdzogs par bsgoms pas ni tshul khrims dang ldan pas dri ma med par gyur pa ste /
translated: The giving of fearlessness is the giving of protection from fear.🔽The giving of goods is the giving of material things.🔽The giving of the Dharma is the giving of the Dharma.🔽The giving of fearlessness is the giving of protection from fear.

original: dri ma med pa'i sa thob pa'i bdag nyid gang yin pa'o //🔽de bzhin du 'og ma rnams dang yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: dri ma med pa'i sa thob pa'i bdag nyid gang yin pa'o // de bzhin du 'og ma rnams dang yang shes par bya'o //
translated: The giving of goods is the giving of material things.🔽The giving of the Dharma is the giving of the Dharma.🔽The giving of fearlessness is the giving of protection from fear.🔽The giving of goods is the giving of material things.🔽The giving of the Dharma is the giving of the Dharma.🔽The giving of fearlessness is the giving of protection from fear.🔽The giving of goods is the giving of material things.🔽The giving of the Dharma is the giving of the Dharma.🔽The giving of fearlessness is the giving of protection from fear.🔽The giving of goods is the giving of material things.🔽The giving of the Dharma is the giving of the Dharma.🔽The giving of fearlessness is the giving of protection from fear.🔽The giving of goods is the giving of material things.🔽The giving of the Dharma is the giving of the Dharma.🔽The giving of fearlessness is the giving of protection from fear.🔽The giving of goods is the giving of material things.🔽The giving of the Dharma is the giving of the Dharma.🔽The giving of fearlessness is the giving of protection from fear.🔽The giving of goods is the giving of material things.🔽The giving of the Dharma is the giving of the Dharma.🔽The giving of fearlessness is the giving of protection from fear.

original: 'od byed pa ni 'od byed pa'i sa thob pa'o //
analyzed: 'od byed pa ni 'od byed pa'i sa thob pa'o //
translated: The giving of goods is the giving of material things.🔽The giving

original: brtson 'grus ni bsod nams dang ldan zhing dam tshig la sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus ni bsod nams dang ldan zhing dam tshig la sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'o //
translated: Effort is the root of virtue of the bodhisattva who is endowed with merit and is intent on the vow.

original: 'od 'phro can zhes bya ba ni 'od 'phro ba thob pa'o //
analyzed: 'od 'phro can zhes bya ba ni 'od 'phro ba thob pa'o //
translated: The Radiant is the attainment of radiance.

original: mngon gyur mthong zhes bya ba ni sa mngon du gyur pa thob pa ste rang gi sems kyis mthong ba'o //
analyzed: mngon gyur mthong zhes bya ba ni sa mngon du gyur pa thob pa ste rang gi sems kyis mthong ba'o //
translated: The Clearly Manifest is the attainment of the clearly manifest stage, which is seen by one's own mind.

original: lhag ma rnams ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is self-evident.

original: rgyal ba zhes bya ba ni bag chags dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa thams cad las nges par rgyal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyal ba zhes bya ba ni bag chags dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa thams cad las nges par rgyal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The Victor is so called because he is victorious over all obscurations, together with their instincts.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i de bzhin nyid thugs su chud pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i de bzhin nyid thugs su chud pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The Tathagata is so called because he has realized the suchness of all things in its utter purity.

original: de lta bur gyur pa ni bcu gcig pa kun du  'od ces bya ba ni sa bcu gcig pa thob pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa ni bcu gcig pa kun du  'od ces bya ba ni sa bcu gcig pa thob pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The Eleventh is the attainment of the eleventh stage, called the Illuminating.

original: rang rig bdag nyid ces bya ba ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems kyis de ltar lhag par mos pa ste de kho na nyid du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rang rig bdag nyid ces bya ba ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems kyis de ltar lhag par mos pa ste de kho na nyid du ni ma yin no //
translated: The phrase “with the nature of self-awareness” means that the bodhisattva imagines himself in that way with a mind that is concentrated, but not in reality.

original: rang rig pa'i bdag nyid du gyur pa ni sa snga ma rnams dang yang spyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: rang rig pa'i bdag nyid du gyur pa ni sa snga ma rnams dang yang spyar bar bya'o //
translated: The phrase “with the nature of self-awareness” should be applied to all the stages.

original: pha rol phyin pa bcu rnams dang // zhes bya ba ni spyin pa la sogs pa rnams so //🔽stobs rnams bcu nyid do //
analyzed: pha rol phyin pa bcu rnams dang // zhes bya ba ni spyin pa la sogs pa rnams so // stobs rnams bcu nyid do //
translated: The phrase “the ten perfections” refers to generosity and the rest.🔽The ten powers are the ten powers of a buddha.

original: dbang rnams kyang bcu nyid do //
analyzed: dbang rnams kyang bcu nyid do //
translated: The ten masteries are the ten masteries of a buddha.

original: 'das gyur na zhes bya ba ni bcu gcig par ro //🔽mtshan ma brtan @136b par bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan mar gyur pas mtshan ma ni byang chub kyi sems te /
analyzed: 'das gyur na zhes bya ba ni bcu gcig par ro // mtshan ma brtan @136b par bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan mar gyur pas mtshan ma ni byang chub kyi sems te /
translated: The phrase “having gone beyond” refers to the eleventh stage.🔽The phrase “the sign of stability” means that the sign of a bodhisattva is the thought of awakening.

original: de nye bar brtan par gyur pas 'dis ston pas na mtshan ma brtan pa'o //
analyzed: de nye bar brtan par gyur pas 'dis ston pas na mtshan ma brtan pa'o //
translated: The phrase “the sign of stability” means that the bodhisattva is taught to be stable in that sign.

original: de nas ni zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma brtan par gyur pa de las gong du rdo rje chur gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de nas ni zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma brtan par gyur pa de las gong du rdo rje chur gyur pa'o //
translated: The phrase “after that” means that after the sign of stability, the vajra-like concentration arises.

original: de yang ci zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: de yang ci zhig yin zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes bya ba gsungs te yang dag pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes bya ba gsungs te yang dag pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The term “perfect buddha” refers to authentic transcendent wisdom.

original: su zhig gi yin zhe na /
analyzed: su zhig gi yin zhe na /
translated: Whose?

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi'o //
translated: The buddhas.

original: ji tsam zhig ce na /
analyzed: ji tsam zhig ce na /
translated: How much?

original: mtha' yas pa ste /
analyzed: mtha' yas pa ste /
translated: Infinite.

original: nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'o //
translated: Like space.

original: gzung dang 'dzin pa spangs pa yin //
analyzed: gzung dang 'dzin pa spangs pa yin //
translated: It is free from the apprehended and the apprehender.

original: zhes bya ba ni gnyis su snang ba nub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gnyis su snang ba nub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the appearance of duality has subsided.

original: de ni chos kyang yin te yang dag pa'i ye shes yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni chos kyang yin te yang dag pa'i ye shes yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the Dharma because it is authentic transcendent wisdom.

original: bdud rtsi yang yin te brtan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bdud rtsi yang yin te brtan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is nectar because it is stable.

original: bde ba'i sbyor ba phul du byung ba yin pas so //
analyzed: bde ba'i sbyor ba phul du byung ba yin pas so //
translated: It is the supreme application of bliss.

original: bcud kyis len yang yin te nyon mongs pa'i nad ma lus pa'i gnyen por gyur pa yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: bcud kyis len yang yin te nyon mongs pa'i nad ma lus pa'i gnyen por gyur pa yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: It is an elixir because it is the antidote to all the illnesses of the afflictions.

original: de ltar na chos kyi bdud rtsi bcud kyis len zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar na chos kyi bdud rtsi bcud kyis len zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Thus, it is called the elixir of the Dharma nectar.

original: dag pa ni nyes pa thams cad zad pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dag pa ni nyes pa thams cad zad pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is pure because it is the exhaustion of all faults.

original: 'thungs pas zhes bya ba la ji ltar 'thung zhe na /
analyzed: 'thungs pas zhes bya ba la ji ltar 'thung zhe na /
translated: How is it drunk?

original: chos thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du lhag par mos la /
analyzed: chos thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du lhag par mos la /
translated: One should imagine all dharmas as all the Tathagatas,

original: de rnams kyi snying po sa bon gyi sngags las 'od zer rnams phyung ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi snying po sa bon gyi sngags las 'od zer rnams phyung ste /
translated: and should emit light rays from the seed syllable of their essence.

original: 'gro ba ma lus pa khyab par byas nas 'o ma'i rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa bkang la de nyid 'thungs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bdag nyid kyang de bzhin du zhu bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba ma lus pa khyab par byas nas 'o ma'i rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa bkang la de nyid 'thungs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bdag nyid kyang de bzhin du zhu bar bya'o //
translated: Having pervaded all the world, one should drink that very [light] which fills the endless ocean of milk, and one should melt oneself and all the Tathagatas in the same way.

original: rdo rje'i slob ma zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi slob ma'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i slob ma zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi slob ma'o //
translated: The vajra disciple is the disciple who is of the nature of a vajra.

original: gdod nas zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: gdod nas zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: From the beginning means the dharmadhatu.

original: de ni sgrib pa thams cad zad pa yin pas na dag pa yin pa'i phyir gdod nas dag pa ste /
analyzed: de ni sgrib pa thams cad zad pa yin pas na dag pa yin pa'i phyir gdod nas dag pa ste /
translated: Since that is the exhaustion of all obscurations, it is pure, and therefore it is pure from the beginning.

original: de ltar de gdod nas dag par 'gyur zhing byang chub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar de gdod nas dag par 'gyur zhing byang chub par 'gyur ro //
translated: In that way, it becomes pure from the beginning and becomes enlightened.

original: rang gi so sor rtogs pas 'o ma'i rgya mtsho de nyid mngon par bsdus la /
analyzed: rang gi so sor rtogs pas 'o ma'i rgya mtsho de nyid mngon par bsdus la /
translated: Through one's own realization, one should gather that very ocean of milk.

original: dang po zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du mthong bas ni /
analyzed: dang po zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du mthong bas ni /
translated: Since one sees the moon-disk at first,

original: de nas de'i 'og tu byang chub kyi sems su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas de'i 'og tu byang chub kyi sems su 'gyur ro //
translated: then after that, it becomes the thought of enlightenment.

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa mthong bas na byang chub kyi sems kyi bdag nyid can du gyur zhes bya'o //
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa mthong bas na byang chub kyi sems kyi bdag nyid can du gyur zhes bya'o //
translated: Since one sees the second moon-disk, it is said, it becomes the nature of the thought of enlightenment.

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i steng du rdo rje'i @137a * //
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i steng du rdo rje'i @137a * //
translated: Above the second moon-disk, one sees the form of the vajra.

original: gzugs mthong bas ni byang chub kyi sems brtan par byed pa yin pas /
analyzed: gzugs mthong bas ni byang chub kyi sems brtan par byed pa yin pas /
translated: Since one stabilizes the thought of enlightenment,

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
translated: thus one is called a bodhisattva.

original: de nas rdo rje de nyid rdo rje dbyings su spro zhing bsdus pas de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje de nyid rdo rje dbyings su spro zhing bsdus pas de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Then, since that very vajra emanates and gathers into the vajra realm, one is called a tathāgata.

original: zla ba gnyis dang rdo rje yongs su gyur pa las sangs rgyas kyi gzugs thob pas rnam par grol ba'i ras kyis g-yogs zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zla ba gnyis dang rdo rje yongs su gyur pa las sangs rgyas kyi gzugs thob pas rnam par grol ba'i ras kyis g-yogs zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Since one obtains the form of the Buddha from the transformation of the two moons and the vajra, one is called covered with the cloth of liberation.

original: snying gar zla ba bsgoms pas /
analyzed: snying gar zla ba bsgoms pas /
translated: Meditating on the moon at the heart,

original: byang chub sems ni bla na med //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni bla na med //
translated: the unsurpassed thought of enlightenment

original: yang dag bskyed 'gyur zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag bskyed 'gyur zhes bya'o //
translated: is generated, it is said.

original: zla ba der rdo rje bsgoms pas snying la zhes bya ba la de bzhin gshegs par gyur pa'i bdag nyid kyi snying la'o //
analyzed: zla ba der rdo rje bsgoms pas snying la zhes bya ba la de bzhin gshegs par gyur pa'i bdag nyid kyi snying la'o //
translated: In that month, by meditating on the vajra, in the heart, that is, in the heart of the nature of the Tathāgata.

original: 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba'i ye shes gcig yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba'i ye shes gcig yin no //
translated: This is the one secret wisdom.

original: gnyis pa ba stan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gnyis pa ba stan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the second,

original: sems can khams ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: sems can khams ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
translated: he declares the realm of sentient beings, etc.

original: sems can khams ni mtha' zhes bya ba na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi'o //
analyzed: sems can khams ni mtha' zhes bya ba na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi'o //
translated: The realm of sentient beings is the end, that is, of all the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas.

original: mar gyur zhes bya ba ni skyed par byed pa ste phyogs bcu nas 'ongs pa'i yi ge bcu drug go //
analyzed: mar gyur zhes bya ba ni skyed par byed pa ste phyogs bcu nas 'ongs pa'i yi ge bcu drug go //
translated: The mother is the producer, the sixteen vowels that have come from the ten directions.

original: dam tshig 'dzin byed ma zhes bya ba ni de rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par yang dag par 'dus pa ni dam tshig ste /
analyzed: dam tshig 'dzin byed ma zhes bya ba ni de rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par yang dag par 'dus pa ni dam tshig ste /
translated: The pledge-holder is the one who gathers them into the form of the moon-disc, the pledge.

original: de 'dzin par byed pas na dam tshig 'dzin byed ma ste de spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: de 'dzin par byed pas na dam tshig 'dzin byed ma ste de spyad par bya'o //
translated: Since she holds that, she is the pledge-holder, and she is to be enjoyed.

original: ji ltar spyad par bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar spyad par bya zhe na /
translated: How is she to be enjoyed?

original: rdo rje dam tshig gis zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: rdo rje dam tshig gis zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The vajra pledge,

original: rdo rje 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang ka la sogs pa'i yi ge sum cu rtsa bzhi phyogs bcu nas 'ongs pa rnams so //
analyzed: rdo rje 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang ka la sogs pa'i yi ge sum cu rtsa bzhi phyogs bcu nas 'ongs pa rnams so //
translated: this vajra is the Tathagatas and the thirty-four syllables such as ka, which have come from the ten directions.

original: de nyid ni dam tshig ste zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i rnam par yang dag par 'dus pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni dam tshig ste zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i rnam par yang dag par 'dus pa ste /
translated: That itself is the pledge, the form of the two moon-discs, which are perfectly gathered together.

original: de spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: de spyad par bya'o //
translated: One should practice that.

original: de ni bud med dang skyes pa'i tshul yin pas na spyad pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni bud med dang skyes pa'i tshul yin pas na spyad pa zhes bya'o //
translated: That is the way of the woman and the man, and so it is called “practice. ”

original: rtag tu dam tshig gnas par 'gyur //
analyzed: rtag tu dam tshig gnas par 'gyur //
translated: One always abides in the pledge.

original: zhes bya ba ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i steng du rdo rje bsgoms pas byang chub kyi sems de nyid brtan par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i steng du rdo rje bsgoms pas byang chub kyi sems de nyid brtan par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the enlightenment spirit itself becomes stable by the meditation on the vajra upon the two moon-discs.

original: khams gsum lam ni nyams dga' bar //
analyzed: khams gsum lam ni nyams dga' bar //
translated: The three realms are the path of delight.

original: zhes bya ba ni phyogs thams cad du bud med ni phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni phyogs thams cad du bud med ni phyag rgya ste /
translated: This is because the woman is the seal in all directions.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi skabs su bshad pa rnams spros pa de thams cad thugs rdo rje'i @137b byed pa pos spyad par bya ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi skabs su bshad pa rnams spros pa de thams cad thugs rdo rje'i @137b byed pa pos spyad par bya ste /
translated: All that elaboration explained in the context of the body, speech, and mind of all buddhas should be practiced by the agent of the mind vajra.

original: rdo rje ni skyes pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje ni skyes pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the vajra is the male.

original: cho ga bzhin zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i sbyor bas so //
analyzed: cho ga bzhin zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i sbyor bas so //
translated: “According to the rite” means by the yoga of the concise.

original: mi smod do zhes bya ba ni mi spang ba'o //
analyzed: mi smod do zhes bya ba ni mi spang ba'o //
translated: “Not disparaging” means not rejecting.

original: zla ba gnyis dang rdo rje ni rdo rje gsum ste de yongs su gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa ni rdo rje gsum gyi sku zhes bya ste rnam pa lnga pa'o //
analyzed: zla ba gnyis dang rdo rje ni rdo rje gsum ste de yongs su gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa ni rdo rje gsum gyi sku zhes bya ste rnam pa lnga pa'o //
translated: The two moons and the vajra are the three vajras, and the tathāgata who is their transformation is called the “body of the three vajras.”

original: rdo rje gsum gyi sku de la gnas pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste thugs kyi phyag rgya snying ga'i zla ba dang rdo rje'i gzugs su gyur pa de tshim par bya zhing rgyas par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum gyi sku de la gnas pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste thugs kyi phyag rgya snying ga'i zla ba dang rdo rje'i gzugs su gyur pa de tshim par bya zhing rgyas par bya'o //
translated: The pledge seal that abides in that body of the three vajras, the mind seal, becomes the form of the moon and vajra at the heart, and it should be satisfied and expanded.

original: gsung gi rdo rje ni snying po dang sngags rnams so //
analyzed: gsung gi rdo rje ni snying po dang sngags rnams so //
translated: The speech vajra is the essence mantras.

original: ji ltar tshim par bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar tshim par bya zhe na /
translated: How should it be satisfied?

original: rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gis te /
analyzed: rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gis te /
translated: By the pledge of the three vajras.

original: rdo rje gsum rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rab tu dga' ba'i tshul gyis so //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rab tu dga' ba'i tshul gyis so //
translated: By the manner of the joy of the perfection of the three vajras.

original: smad mi bya zhes bya ba ni spang bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: smad mi bya zhes bya ba ni spang bar mi bya'o //
translated: One should not despise means one should not abandon.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' ni snying po dang sngags de nyid de /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' ni snying po dang sngags de nyid de /
translated: Vajrasattva is the essence-mantra itself.

original: de las yang dag par byung ba'i phyag rgya chen po kun no //
analyzed: de las yang dag par byung ba'i phyag rgya chen po kun no //
translated: All the great seals that arise from that.

original: bud med bzang zhes bya ba ni rab tu dga' ba ste longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus yang dag par bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bud med bzang zhes bya ba ni rab tu dga' ba ste longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus yang dag par bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The good women are the joy, because they are included in the enjoyment body.

original: de rnams ba stan pa ni bsgom pa ste des phyag rgya thams cad ces bya ba lha mo de dag nyid dbang du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de rnams ba stan pa ni bsgom pa ste des phyag rgya thams cad ces bya ba lha mo de dag nyid dbang du 'gyur ro //
translated: The teaching of them is the meditation, by which all the seals, those goddesses, are brought under one’s control.

original: bud med ces bya ba ji snyed pa zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis bsdus pa'i phyag rgya chen po dang dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor rnams su'o //
analyzed: bud med ces bya ba ji snyed pa zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis bsdus pa'i phyag rgya chen po dang dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor rnams su'o //
translated: As many women as there are means all the great seals included in the mandala of gnosis and the mandalas of the pledges.

original: sbyor ba yis zhes bya ba ni dngos po gcig tu gyur pa ste de lta bus dus de dag kun la nye bar spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba yis zhes bya ba ni dngos po gcig tu gyur pa ste de lta bus dus de dag kun la nye bar spyad par bya'o //
translated: By means of the practice, which is the unity, one should enjoy all those times.

original: yang na byung ba ni spros pa'o //
analyzed: yang na byung ba ni spros pa'o //
translated: Or else, the arising is the proliferation.

original: bud med bzang ni phul du byung ba'i dga' ba'i yul du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bud med bzang ni phul du byung ba'i dga' ba'i yul du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The good woman is the object of excellent joy.

original: ba sten pa ni goms par byed pa ste /
analyzed: ba sten pa ni goms par byed pa ste /
translated: The practice is the cultivation.

original: yang dang yang du spros pa ste des dbang du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang dang yang du spros pa ste des dbang du 'gyur ro //
translated: By that, one should become powerful through the repeated proliferation.

original: spro ba la dbang du gyur pa nyid thob pas spro bar bya'o /
analyzed: spro ba la dbang du gyur pa nyid thob pas spro bar bya'o /
translated: Having attained the power over proliferation, one should proliferate.

original: phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: By means of the practice of the great seal,

original: zhes bya ba ni rang gi snying ga'i sngags su bsdu ba ste des nye bar longs spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang gi snying ga'i sngags su bsdu ba ste des nye bar longs spyad par bya'o //
translated: one should enjoy, by means of the mantra at one's heart, which is the collection.

original: sbyor ba gnyis po 'di dag ni mchog tu gsang ba yin te /
analyzed: sbyor ba gnyis po 'di dag ni mchog tu gsang ba yin te /
translated: These two practices are supremely secret.

original: dang po ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i khyad par yin no //
analyzed: dang po ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i khyad par yin no //
translated: The first is the special conferral of the secret empowerment.

original: gnyis pa ni shes rab ye shes kyi khyad par yin no //
analyzed: gnyis pa ni shes rab ye shes kyi khyad par yin no //
translated: The second is the special wisdom-knowledge empowerment.

original: 'di gnyis phul du byung bar ba stan pa ni gsang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di gnyis phul du byung bar ba stan pa ni gsang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
translated: The excellence of these two is stated by “secret” and so on.

original: @138a * // gnyis ka yang mchog tu gsang ba'i rnal 'byor yin no //
analyzed: @138a * // gnyis ka yang mchog tu gsang ba'i rnal 'byor yin no //
translated: Both are the yoga of supreme secrecy.

original: ting 'dzin ye shes dam pa yin //
analyzed: ting 'dzin ye shes dam pa yin //
translated: “The wisdom of meditative stabilization is supreme”

original: zhes bya ba ni 'dir ting nge 'dzin gtso bo yin gyi nga rgyal la sogs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'dir ting nge 'dzin gtso bo yin gyi nga rgyal la sogs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: means that here meditative stabilization is primary, not pride and so on.

original: de la nga rgyal ni bdag nyid rang gi lhar nges pa ste de yang 'dir mi dgos te /
analyzed: de la nga rgyal ni bdag nyid rang gi lhar nges pa ste de yang 'dir mi dgos te /
translated: Pride is the ascertainment of oneself as one’s deity, but that is not necessary here,

original: rnam par mi rtog pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because of nonconceptuality.

original: h'um ni bgegs bskrad pa'i phyir te de yang 'dir mi dgos te bgegs med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: h'um ni bgegs bskrad pa'i phyir te de yang 'dir mi dgos te bgegs med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Hum is for the purpose of expelling obstructors, but that is not necessary here, because there are no obstructors.

original: rig pa ni phreng ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: rig pa ni phreng ba'i sngags so //
translated: Vidyā is the garland mantra.

original: sngags rig pa ni sngags lhag ma rnams te /
analyzed: sngags rig pa ni sngags lhag ma rnams te /
translated: Mantravidyā is the remaining mantras.

original: rig pa dang sngags kyang 'dir bzla mi dgos te /
analyzed: rig pa dang sngags kyang 'dir bzla mi dgos te /
translated: Vidyā and mantra are not necessary here,

original: rnal 'byor gyis sngon du bsnyen pa rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyis sngon du bsnyen pa rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the yoga is complete through prior approximation.

original: 'dir dam tshig ba stan pa ni lag pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'dir dam tshig ba stan pa ni lag pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Here, the teaching of the commitments is stated by “living beings” and so forth.

original: srog chags ni rang gi sems nyid kyi so sor snang ba'i khyad par te /
analyzed: srog chags ni rang gi sems nyid kyi so sor snang ba'i khyad par te /
translated: Living beings are the special appearances of one’s own mind.

original: de rnams bsad pa ni nub cing mi snang bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams bsad pa ni nub cing mi snang bar bya ba'o //
translated: Killing them is causing them to set and not appear.

original: brdzun du smra ba ni de'i don dmigs su med pa'o //
analyzed: brdzun du smra ba ni de'i don dmigs su med pa'o //
translated: Lying is the non-apprehension of their meaning.

original: ma byin par blang ba ni rang gi sems snang ba de nyid shes pa'o //
analyzed: ma byin par blang ba ni rang gi sems snang ba de nyid shes pa'o //
translated: Stealing is the knowledge of those appearances of one’s own mind.

original: bud med ni phyag rgya rnams so //
analyzed: bud med ni phyag rgya rnams so //
translated: Women are the consorts.

original: bsnye pa ni gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor gyi don gyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bsnye pa ni gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor gyi don gyi phyir ro //
translated: Copulating is for the sake of the meaning of nondual yoga.

original: gzhan min sems kyis zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes las mi g-yo bas so //
analyzed: gzhan min sems kyis zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes las mi g-yo bas so //
translated: With an unerring mind means not wavering from the gnosis of meditative concentration.

original: rab tu grub ces bya ba ni gzhan du ma gyur pa'i sems kyis zhes bya ba dang spyar ro //
analyzed: rab tu grub ces bya ba ni gzhan du ma gyur pa'i sems kyis zhes bya ba dang spyar ro //
translated: Well-established means with an unerring mind.

original: sangs rgyas chos nyid ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas chos nyid ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes so //
translated: The reality of the buddhas is the gnosis of the buddhas’ meditative concentration.

original: dang po'i mchog tu gsang ba'i sbyor ba las dang por pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi mtshan ma brtan par gyur pa ba stan nas ;
analyzed: dang po'i mchog tu gsang ba'i sbyor ba las dang por pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi mtshan ma brtan par gyur pa ba stan nas ;
translated: First, the supreme secret practice is taught.

original: chos gzhan dag kyang ba stan par bya ba'i phyir ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: chos gzhan dag kyang ba stan par bya ba'i phyir ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Then, in order to teach other dharmas, he says “unmixed” and so on.

original: de rnams rtag tu bsgom pa ni //
analyzed: de rnams rtag tu bsgom pa ni //
translated: “Always cultivating those”

original: zhes bya ba ni nyi ma re re zhing de rnams mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du thob pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nyi ma re re zhing de rnams mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du thob pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: means cultivating those as they are characterized, day by day.

original: mtshan ma brtan par gyur pa yin pas na mtshan ma ba stan pa yin te /
analyzed: mtshan ma brtan par gyur pa yin pas na mtshan ma ba stan pa yin te /
translated: Since the signs are firm, the signs are cultivated.

original: de'i 'og tu ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: After that, it is as before.

original: bsam gtan bzhi dang gzugs med bzhi //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi dang gzugs med bzhi //
translated: The four concentrations and four formless states

original: 'gog pa'i snyoms 'jug ces bya ba ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste /
analyzed: 'gog pa'i snyoms 'jug ces bya ba ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste /
translated: are called the “attainment of cessation,” which are the nine serial absorptions.

original: 'di dag 'thob par bsgoms pas mtshan ma brtan pa ste /
analyzed: 'di dag 'thob par bsgoms pas mtshan ma brtan pa ste /
translated: Cultivating the attainment of those is the firm sign.

original: lhag @138b ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: lhag @138b ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The rest is as before.

original: byang chub phyogs ni sum cu bdun //
analyzed: byang chub phyogs ni sum cu bdun //
translated: The thirty-seven factors of awakening

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is the🔽purification of the thirty-seven factors of enlightenment.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyang po ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun no //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyang po ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun no //
translated: The four foundations of mindfulness, the four right efforts, the four bases of supernatural power, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven factors of enlightenment, and the eightfold noble path are the thirty-seven factors of enlightenment.

original: de rnams bsgoms pas dag pa ni //
analyzed: de rnams bsgoms pas dag pa ni //
translated: Their cultivation is purification.

original: zhes bya ba ni de rnams bsgoms pas mtshan ma brtan par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de rnams bsgoms pas mtshan ma brtan par gyur pa'o //
translated: This is the firm appearance of those signs through their cultivation.

original: rdo rje chu 'thungs pas ni gdod nas dag par gyur te dang po zla ba mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje chu 'thungs pas ni gdod nas dag par gyur te dang po zla ba mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: By drinking the vajra water, one becomes primordially pure, because one sees the moon for the first time.

original: de nas zla ba gnyis pa mthong bas ni byang chub sems dpa'o //
analyzed: de nas zla ba gnyis pa mthong bas ni byang chub sems dpa'o //
translated: Then, by seeing the second moon, one is a bodhisattva.

original: de'i dbus kyi rdo rje mthong bas ni 'gro ba la phan pa'o //
analyzed: de'i dbus kyi rdo rje mthong bas ni 'gro ba la phan pa'o //
translated: By seeing the vajra in the middle of that, one benefits migrating beings.

original: lhag ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The rest is as before.

original: de nas gang zla ba gnyis pa'i steng du rdo rje 'di ci zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: de nas gang zla ba gnyis pa'i steng du rdo rje 'di ci zhig yin zhe na /
translated: Then, what is this vajra in the second month?

original: 'gro ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'gro ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He declares, “pervading the world,” etc.

original: 'gro ba rnams la spros pa ni khyab pa ste /
analyzed: 'gro ba rnams la spros pa ni khyab pa ste /
translated: Pervading the world means pervading all beings,

original: chos thams cad la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the object of all dharmas.

original: brtan pa ni mi phyed pa'o //
analyzed: brtan pa ni mi phyed pa'o //
translated: Firm means indivisible.

original: snying po ni 'jigs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: snying po ni 'jigs pa med pa'o //
translated: Essence means fearless.

original: ci'i phyir brtan pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir brtan pa yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it firm?

original: gang gi phyir rab bsgoms pa zhes bya ba gsungs pas so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rab bsgoms pa zhes bya ba gsungs pas so //
translated: Because it is well cultivated.

original: ci'i phyir snying po yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir snying po yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it an essence?

original: gang gi phyir /🔽stong pa'i de nyid las byung ba //
analyzed: gang gi phyir / stong pa'i de nyid las byung ba //
translated: Because

original: zhes bya ba gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it arises from the reality of emptiness.

original: de yang stong pa nyid de kho na nyid ni de nyid de /
analyzed: de yang stong pa nyid de kho na nyid ni de nyid de /
translated: That reality of emptiness is itself,

original: de las byung ba ni shin tu phyin ci log ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las byung ba ni shin tu phyin ci log ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and arising from it means that it is not utterly erroneous.

original: rdo rje ye shes ni rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes so //
analyzed: rdo rje ye shes ni rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes so //
translated: Vajra intuition is the intuition like a vajra.

original: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa des na rdo rje ni rdo rje dbyings kyi spro ba yin pa de ci zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa des na rdo rje ni rdo rje dbyings kyi spro ba yin pa de ci zhig yin zhe na /
translated: Since that is so, what is the vajra that is the emanation of the vajra realm?

original: chos bdag med ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: chos bdag med ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The Dharma, selflessness, and so on are stated.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dbyings rnams ni chos te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dbyings rnams ni chos te /
translated: The realms of the body, speech, and mind of all tathāgatas are the Dharma.

original: de rnams kyi bdag med pa ni gnyis su snang ba nub par gyur pa'o ;
analyzed: de rnams kyi bdag med pa ni gnyis su snang ba nub par gyur pa'o ;
translated: Their selflessness is the disappearance of the appearance of duality.

original: / de la dmigs pa ni yang dag par byung ba'o //
analyzed: / de la dmigs pa ni yang dag par byung ba'o //
translated: The focus on that is the arising.

original: bdag nyid kyang gnyis su snang ba dang bral bas gnyis su med pa'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyang gnyis su snang ba dang bral bas gnyis su med pa'o //
translated: Since it is free from the appearance of duality, it is nondual.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pas na rnam pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pas na rnam pa'o //
translated: Since it is extremely pure, it is the aspect.

original: chos ni lam gyi bden pa ste de nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so //
analyzed: chos ni lam gyi bden pa ste de nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so //
translated: The Dharma is the truth of the path, and that itself is the qualities of the Buddha.

original: de rnams kyi rang bzhin ni chos nyid @139a * //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rang bzhin ni chos nyid @139a * //
translated: Their nature is the reality of the Dharma.

original: do ; / de'i mchog ni 'jig rten las 'das pa nyid yin pa'i phyir dang / byab par byed pa nyid kyis rtogs pas na chos nyid mchog go //
analyzed: do ; / de'i mchog ni 'jig rten las 'das pa nyid yin pa'i phyir dang / byab par byed pa nyid kyis rtogs pas na chos nyid mchog go //
translated: The best of those is the supramundane itself, and because it is realized by the very act of making it, it is the best reality.

original: chos rnams la 'dzin cing mnyam par 'jog pas chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos rnams la 'dzin cing mnyam par 'jog pas chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is the realm of phenomena because it holds and is evenly placed in phenomena.

original: gal te de ltar na dbyings de rnams kyi rdo rje nye bar bsdu ba de'i ngo bo nyid ni gang /
analyzed: gal te de ltar na dbyings de rnams kyi rdo rje nye bar bsdu ba de'i ngo bo nyid ni gang /
translated: If it is so, then what is the essence of that vajra gathering of the elements?

original: rgyu ni gang /
analyzed: rgyu ni gang /
translated: What is the cause?

original: rgyu'i rgyu ni gang zhe'am /
analyzed: rgyu'i rgyu ni gang zhe'am /
translated: What is the cause of the cause?

original: ming ni ci zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: ming ni ci zhig yin zhe na /
translated: What is the name?

original: de'i phyir chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “the realm of phenomena,” and so on.

original: chos rnams bsdus nas 'dzin pa ni chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos rnams bsdus nas 'dzin pa ni chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is the realm of phenomena because it holds and gathers phenomena.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid ni gnyis su med pa dang brtan pa nyid kyis ni rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin te //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid ni gnyis su med pa dang brtan pa nyid kyis ni rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin te //
translated: Its essence is the vajra-like samadhi because of non-duality and stability.

original: yang dag par kun nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la sems 'dzin pas gang 'das ma thag pa'i tshigs su bcad pas chos kyi dbyings zhes pa de las byung bas na de las skyes pa yin te /
analyzed: yang dag par kun nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la sems 'dzin pas gang 'das ma thag pa'i tshigs su bcad pas chos kyi dbyings zhes pa de las byung bas na de las skyes pa yin te /
translated: which was just mentioned in the verse.

original: de ni 'di'i rgyu yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de ni 'di'i rgyu yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: That is its cause, is the meaning.

original: rdo rje ye shes ni sngar gyi tshigs su bcad pas bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: rdo rje ye shes ni sngar gyi tshigs su bcad pas bshad pa yin te /
translated: The vajra intuition is explained by the previous verse.

original: de ni de'i rgyu'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: de ni de'i rgyu'i rgyu yin no //
translated: That is its causal cause.

original: rdo rje ye shes kyi rang bzhin ni rdo rje dbyings 'di las yod pas na rdo rje dbyings so //
analyzed: rdo rje ye shes kyi rang bzhin ni rdo rje dbyings 'di las yod pas na rdo rje dbyings so //
translated: The vajra realm is this, since it exists as the nature of the vajra intuition.

original: da ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi de kho na nyid ba stan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi de kho na nyid ba stan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the reality of the deities such as Vairochana,

original: sems kyi spro ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: sems kyi spro ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he declares the mental emanation, etc.

original: chos thams cad la spros pa med pa'i ye shes ni sems kyi spro ba ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad la spros pa med pa'i ye shes ni sems kyi spro ba ste /
translated: The intuition that is without mental elaboration with respect to all phenomena is the mental emanation.

original: de'i sbyor ba ste /
analyzed: de'i sbyor ba ste /
translated: That is its yoga.

original: des de la gong du spros pa med pa'i ye shes de'i bsdu bas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du bya ba ni phra mo'i ye shes te /
analyzed: des de la gong du spros pa med pa'i ye shes de'i bsdu bas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du bya ba ni phra mo'i ye shes te /
translated: The above-mentioned wisdom without proliferation is the moon mandala.

original: de la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni phra mo'i ye shes sogs zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni phra mo'i ye shes sogs zhes bya ste /
translated: The wisdom of subtle yoga is the moon mandala.

original: ye shes lnga po rnam pa lnga'i tshul te de'i sbyor bas so //
analyzed: ye shes lnga po rnam pa lnga'i tshul te de'i sbyor bas so //
translated: The five wisdoms are the five aspects.

original: des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes brnyes pas na de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes brnyes pas na de skad ces bya ste /
translated: By the yoga of that, he attained the wisdom of all the tathagatas.

original: de ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: de ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: That is the bhagavat Vairochana.

original: de yang ye shes lnga thugs su chud pas sna tshogs ba'i mchog tu gyur cing chos thams cad la dbang du gyur pa brnyes pas na /
analyzed: de yang ye shes lnga thugs su chud pas sna tshogs ba'i mchog tu gyur cing chos thams cad la dbang du gyur pa brnyes pas na /
translated: He is the supreme variety because he has realized the five wisdoms. He has attained mastery over all phenomena.

original: 'di ni dkyil 'khor 'di'i bdag po'i tshul te ngo bo nyid kyi sku yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni dkyil 'khor 'di'i bdag po'i tshul te ngo bo nyid kyi sku yin no //
translated: This is the nature body, the nature of the lord of this mandala.

original: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor pa rnams ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yin te /
analyzed: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor pa rnams ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yin te /
translated: The mandala deities Akshobhya and so forth are the enjoyment body.

original: ji ltar thugs su chud pa'i @139b sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par phye ste /
analyzed: ji ltar thugs su chud pa'i @139b sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par phye ste /
translated: All the qualities of the Buddha, which are understood in this way, are distinguished.

original: de rnams kyi cha re re zhing rgyu dang 'bras bus bsdus pa des 'dul ba'i skye bo rnams rjes su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de rnams kyi cha re re zhing rgyu dang 'bras bus bsdus pa des 'dul ba'i skye bo rnams rjes su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: And each of those is subsumed by cause and effect, in order to guide those who are to be trained.

original: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i skur yang dag par ston pa yin no //🔽de lta na ni de rnams las la la ni sangs rgyas la ;
analyzed: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i skur yang dag par ston pa yin no // de lta na ni de rnams las la la ni sangs rgyas la ;
translated: They are revealed as the bodies of Akshobhya and so forth.🔽In that case, what is the appearance of some of them as Buddhas,

original: la la ni byang chub sems dpar snang ba 'di ci zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: la la ni byang chub sems dpar snang ba 'di ci zhig yin zhe na /
translated: and some of them as Bodhisattvas?

original: de ni gdul bya rnams kyi bsam pa'i khyad par las rnam par ston par mdzad pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni gdul bya rnams kyi bsam pa'i khyad par las rnam par ston par mdzad pa yin no //
translated: That is revealed due to the particular thoughts of those to be trained.

original: gzhan yang 'bras bu'i gnas skabs ba stan pa ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yin la /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'bras bu'i gnas skabs ba stan pa ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yin la /
translated: Moreover, the teaching of the state of fruition is the Buddhas, Akshobhya and so forth.

original: rgyu'i gnas skabs ba stan pa la ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams yin te /
analyzed: rgyu'i gnas skabs ba stan pa la ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams yin te /
translated: The teaching of the state of cause is the Bodhisattvas, Vajrasattva and so forth.

original: de gnyis kas kyang sems can rnams 'dun par mdzad cing 'gro ba rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir rnam pa thams cad du zhugs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de gnyis kas kyang sems can rnams 'dun par mdzad cing 'gro ba rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir rnam pa thams cad du zhugs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Both of them are intent on sentient beings, and they are engaged in every way in order to benefit migrating beings.

original: yang na sems can thams cad la dgyes shing mnyes pas thugs rjes smin par mdzad pas na sems dpa'o //
analyzed: yang na sems can thams cad la dgyes shing mnyes pas thugs rjes smin par mdzad pas na sems dpa'o //
translated: Or else, they are heroes because they are satisfied and pleased with all sentient beings, and they mature them with compassion.

original: byams pa ni gzhan rnams la pan par 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: byams pa ni gzhan rnams la pan par 'dod pa ste /
translated: Love is the desire for others to be happy.

original: de spro ba ni sems can thams cad la khyab par bya'o //
analyzed: de spro ba ni sems can thams cad la khyab par bya'o //
translated: That enthusiasm should be extended to all sentient beings.

original: de'i sbyor ba ni rgyu des byang chub pa la sems dpa'i byang chub kyi spyod pa rnams kyis spyod pas na spyod pa ste /
analyzed: de'i sbyor ba ni rgyu des byang chub pa la sems dpa'i byang chub kyi spyod pa rnams kyis spyod pas na spyod pa ste /
translated: The application of that is the practice of the bodhisattva practices by the bodhisattva for the sake of enlightenment.

original: de dang ldan pas na spyod par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de dang ldan pas na spyod par byed pa'o //
translated: One who possesses that is a practitioner.

original: mchog ces bya ba ni byang chub kyi rgyur gyur pa'i phyir te dam pa'o //
analyzed: mchog ces bya ba ni byang chub kyi rgyur gyur pa'i phyir te dam pa'o //
translated: Supreme means highest, because it is the cause of enlightenment.

original: zag pa med pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zag pa med pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is undefiled because it is transcendent.

original: brtan par gyur pa ni shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: brtan par gyur pa ni shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: It is firm because it is well cultivated.

original: / de bas na nyon mongs pa dang rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis bskyod par mi nus pas na mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: / de bas na nyon mongs pa dang rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis bskyod par mi nus pas na mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: Therefore, since it cannot be shaken by the afflictions and discursive thought, it is unshakable.

original: thugs rje ni pha rol dang bdag nyid du mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te /
analyzed: thugs rje ni pha rol dang bdag nyid du mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te /
translated: Compassion is the intuition of sameness in self and others.

original: de spro ba ni sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs par byed pa'i zang zing gi spyin pas 'gro ba'i don gyi phan pa ste /
analyzed: de spro ba ni sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs par byed pa'i zang zing gi spyin pas 'gro ba'i don gyi phan pa ste /
translated: Its expansion is the benefit of beings, through the giving of material goods, which helps beings.

original: de yang dag par ldan pa ni mi 'jigs pa dang byams pa dang chos kyi spyin pas so //
analyzed: de yang dag par ldan pa ni mi 'jigs pa dang byams pa dang chos kyi spyin pas so //
translated: It is endowed with that, through the giving of fearlessness, love, and the Dharma.

original: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes nyid ni rin chen te de 'byung ba ni skye ba'o //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes nyid ni rin chen te de 'byung ba ni skye ba'o //
translated: The intuition of sameness is a jewel, and its origination is its birth.

original: dga' ba ni de kho na nyid yong sus gcod pa'i bdag nyid can no //🔽de'i spro ba ni theg pa chen po rnam @140a * //🔽pa gsum dang / des byas pa'i rnam par dag pa khyab pa'o //
analyzed: dga' ba ni de kho na nyid yong sus gcod pa'i bdag nyid can no // de'i spro ba ni theg pa chen po rnam @140a * // pa gsum dang / des byas pa'i rnam par dag pa khyab pa'o //
translated: Joy is the nature of the discernment of reality.🔽Its expansion is the pervasion by the three aspects of the universal vehicle and by the purification effected by it.

original: sbyor ba des mtshan pa'i theg pa chen po rnam pa gsum ni byang chub kyi lam ste /
analyzed: sbyor ba des mtshan pa'i theg pa chen po rnam pa gsum ni byang chub kyi lam ste /
translated: The universal vehicle characterized by that application is the path of the bodhisattva.

original: de nyid ni dri ma med pa ste sgrib pa gnyis kyi dri ma med pas shin tu dag pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid ni dri ma med pa ste sgrib pa gnyis kyi dri ma med pas shin tu dag pa yin no //
translated: That itself is stainless, because it is free from the stain of the two obscurations, and thus it is extremely pure.

original: thugs zhes bya ba ni thugs kyi chos nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: thugs zhes bya ba ni thugs kyi chos nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: Mind means the reality of mind.

original: 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Radiant means pure by nature.

original: dag pa ni glo bur ba'i sgrib pa'i dri ma zad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dag pa ni glo bur ba'i sgrib pa'i dri ma zad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Pure means free from the stain of adventitious obscurations.

original: de ltar gsum po de dag gi lam dang de'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni theg pa chen po ste /
analyzed: de ltar gsum po de dag gi lam dang de'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni theg pa chen po ste /
translated: Thus, the Mahayana is the path of those three and the nature of its result.

original: so sor rtog pa dang lhan cig 'dres pa de la 'od dpag med ces bshad do zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: so sor rtog pa dang lhan cig 'dres pa de la 'od dpag med ces bshad do zhes bya ba ste /
translated: In it, the one called Amitabha is explained to be inseparable from discernment.

original: 'od dpag tu med pa'i 'od de shes rab kyi snang ba 'di la mnga' bas de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'od dpag tu med pa'i 'od de shes rab kyi snang ba 'di la mnga' bas de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The light of Amitabha is the light of wisdom, and he is so called because he possesses it.

original: btang snyoms ni gzhan gyi don gyi phyir rang gi don la btang snyoms su 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: btang snyoms ni gzhan gyi don gyi phyir rang gi don la btang snyoms su 'jug pa'o //
translated: Equanimity is the engagement in equanimity with regard to one’s own aim for the sake of the aims of others.

original: de'i spro ba ni sems can rnams la de'i don gyis khyab par byed pa'i thugs te /
analyzed: de'i spro ba ni sems can rnams la de'i don gyis khyab par byed pa'i thugs te /
translated: His delight is the mind that pervades sentient beings with that aim.

original: 'dis ni bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa bshad pa yin no //
translated: This explains the perfection of intention.

original: sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa ni sems can thams cad rtogs par mdzad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa ni sems can thams cad rtogs par mdzad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
translated: The perfection of application is stated in the verse: “He is the one who has realized all sentient beings, etc.

original: byang chub sgrub par byed pa'i las rnams so //
analyzed: byang chub sgrub par byed pa'i las rnams so //
translated: ” The activities that accomplish enlightenment.

original: don yod bla med ces bya ba ni gzhan rnams byang chub sgrub pa'i las so //
analyzed: don yod bla med ces bya ba ni gzhan rnams byang chub sgrub pa'i las so //
translated: “Meaningful, unsurpassed” refers to the activities that accomplish the enlightenment of others.

original: grub pa ni gzhan rnams byang chub pa ste de'i don gyis las gang yin pa de ni 'dir sgrub pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: grub pa ni gzhan rnams byang chub pa ste de'i don gyis las gang yin pa de ni 'dir sgrub pa zhes bya'o //
translated: “Accomplishment” is the enlightenment of others. The activity that has that as its aim is called “accomplishment” here.

original: don yod pa yang yin la grub pa yang yin pas na don yod par grub pa ste ;
analyzed: don yod pa yang yin la grub pa yang yin pas na don yod par grub pa ste ;
translated: It is meaningful and it is accomplishment, thus it is meaningful accomplishment.

original: de bas na don yod grub par de bshad do zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na don yod grub par de bshad do zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is said that he is explained as meaningful accomplishment.

original: yang de'i rgyu ni btang snyoms spros pa'i thugs so //
analyzed: yang de'i rgyu ni btang snyoms spros pa'i thugs so //
translated: Moreover, its cause is the mind of equanimity that is free from conceptual elaboration.

original: de ltar na mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bzhi po rnams kyi de kho na nyid ni rim pa bzhin du byang chub kyi sems dang / spyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: de ltar na mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bzhi po rnams kyi de kho na nyid ni rim pa bzhin du byang chub kyi sems dang / spyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: Thus, the reality tattva of the four Akshobyas and so on is, respectively, the enlightenment mind bodhicitta, the perfection of generosity, the perfection of wisdom, the perfection of effort,

original: yang byang chub kyi sems dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang / don dam pa'i spyod pa dang / yang 'bras bu'i gnas skabs su rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: yang byang chub kyi sems dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang / don dam pa'i spyod pa dang / yang 'bras bu'i gnas skabs su rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: the enlightenment mind, the accumulation of merit, the accumulation of wisdom, the ultimate conduct, and again, in the context of the result, there are two aspects:

original: byang chub chen po dang / @140b sangs rgyas thams cad dbang skur ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / 'gro ba 'dul ba dang / yang chos kyi mchog mngon par rtogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang theg pa chen po yin no //
analyzed: byang chub chen po dang / @140b sangs rgyas thams cad dbang skur ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / 'gro ba 'dul ba dang / yang chos kyi mchog mngon par rtogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang theg pa chen po yin no //
translated: great enlightenment, the consecration of all buddhas, the turning of the wheel of Dharma, the training of beings, the realization of the supreme Dharma, the door of concentration, the door of retention and the Great Vehicle.

original: dpal rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud dang / de bzhin du dpal de kho na nyid bsdus pa las lha sum cu rtsa bdun gyi de kho na nyid gsal bar gsungs so //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud dang / de bzhin du dpal de kho na nyid bsdus pa las lha sum cu rtsa bdun gyi de kho na nyid gsal bar gsungs so //
translated: The glorious Vajraśekhara Tantra and likewise the glorious Tattvasamgraha clearly teach the reality of the thirty-seven deities.

original: de la mi bskyod pa'i de kho na nyid ni byang chub kyi sems te /
analyzed: de la mi bskyod pa'i de kho na nyid ni byang chub kyi sems te /
translated: Therein, the reality of Akṣobhya is the thought of awakening.

original: de yang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir byang chub tu go bgos pa dang ldan pa'i byams pas bsdus pa'i spyad pa spyod par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de yang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir byang chub tu go bgos pa dang ldan pa'i byams pas bsdus pa'i spyad pa spyod par byed pa'o //
translated: Moreover, it is the thought of awakening that is embraced by love for the sake of others, and it is the thought of awakening that engages in the practice of the perfections.

original: de'i rab tu dbye ba'i sems dpa' rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: de'i rab tu dbye ba'i sems dpa' rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: The bodhisattva is of four types, according to the division of the thought of awakening.

original: de la byang chub tu go ba gos pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: de la byang chub tu go ba gos pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: Among them, the thought of awakening that is embraced is Vajrasattva.

original: spyod pa yang dag blangs pa dang / yongs su smin pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa la rgyal po dang chags pa dang legs pa rnams dang rim pa bzhin du spyar bar bya ste /
analyzed: spyod pa yang dag blangs pa dang / yongs su smin pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa la rgyal po dang chags pa dang legs pa rnams dang rim pa bzhin du spyar bar bya ste /
translated: The thought of awakening that is embraced should be applied to the four types of bodhisattvas, respectively: the one who has taken up the practice, the one who is mature, and the one who is perfected.

original: de'i dbang du mdzad nas byang chub ce bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
