analyzed: de'i dbang du mdzad nas byang chub ce bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: With reference to them, the Bhagavān declares, “The thought of awakening, the thought of awakening,” and so on.

original: mthar byang chub chen po'i ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes byang chub kyi sems zhes bshad pa gang yin pa de ni rdo rje zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mthar byang chub chen po'i ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes byang chub kyi sems zhes bshad pa gang yin pa de ni rdo rje zhes bya'o //
translated: The one who is explained as the mind of enlightenment, the pristine wisdom which is the very essence of great enlightenment, is called “vajra.”

original: de bas na 'bras bu'i gnas skabs su yang dag par byung ba'i sems dpa' ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: de bas na 'bras bu'i gnas skabs su yang dag par byung ba'i sems dpa' ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: Therefore, the hero who has arisen in the state of the result is Vajrasattva.

original: 'bras bu'i byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pas na rdo rje ste sangs rgyas so //🔽de yang / byang chub sems gang de rdo rje /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pas na rdo rje ste sangs rgyas so // de yang / byang chub sems gang de rdo rje /
translated: Since he possesses the result-state mind of enlightenment, he is the vajra, the Buddha.

original: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And it is said:🔽That which is the mind of enlightenment is the vajra.

original: de rnams kyi rgyal po yin pas na rdo rje rgyal po'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rgyal po yin pas na rdo rje rgyal po'o //
translated: Since he is the king of those, he is Vajraraja.

original: de yang spyan 'dren pas na lcags kyu ste lcags kyu yin pas na rgyal po'o //
analyzed: de yang spyan 'dren pas na lcags kyu ste lcags kyu yin pas na rgyal po'o //
translated: And since he is the hook that summons, he is the hook, and since he is the hook, he is the king.

original: gzhan yang byang chub tu go bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub tu go bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, the bodhisattva who has been armored for enlightenment becomes the mind of enlightenment.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' ni rgyu'i byang chub kyi sems dang dan pas na /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' ni rgyu'i byang chub kyi sems dang dan pas na /
translated: Since he possesses the causal mind of enlightenment, he is Vajrasattva.

original: des ni byang chub tu bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis 'dren par byed de /
analyzed: des ni byang chub tu bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis 'dren par byed de /
translated: He attracts by means of the four principles of attraction:

original: spyin pa dang snyan par smra ba dang don spyod pa dang don mthun pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: spyin pa dang snyan par smra ba dang don spyod pa dang don mthun pa rnams kyis so //
translated: generosity, kind talk, helpful activity, and appropriate action.

original: de nyid ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rgyal po ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rgyal po ste /
translated: He is the Blessed One Vajrarāja,

original: 'di las kyang rdo rje rnams kyi rgyal po yin pas na rdo rje rgyal po'o //
analyzed: 'di las kyang rdo rje rnams kyi rgyal po yin pas na rdo rje rgyal po'o //
translated: and he is Vajrarāja because he is the king of the vajras.

original: 'di nyid kyis ni rdo rje rigs rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'di nyid kyis ni rdo rje rigs rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He is the one who is called “Vajrarāja” and so on.

original: rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi rgyal por gyur pas na de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi rgyal por gyur pas na de skad ces bya ste /
translated: He is so called because he is the king of all the vajra families.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams @141a * //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams @141a * //
translated: He is the one who attracts the entire assembly of bodhisattvas.

original: cad 'gugs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: cad 'gugs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that he attracts the entire assembly of bodhisattvas.

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams chags par byed pas na rdo rje chags pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams chags par byed pas na rdo rje chags pa ste /
translated: He is Vajrarāga, because he causes the buddhas and bodhisattvas to be passionate.

original: de la sangs rgyas rnams chags par bya ba ni mnyes par byas pa'o //
analyzed: de la sangs rgyas rnams chags par bya ba ni mnyes par byas pa'o //
translated: There, the buddhas are caused to be passionate by being pleased.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams chags par bya ba ni smin par byas pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams chags par bya ba ni smin par byas pa ste /
translated: The bodhisattvas are attached to the maturation of sentient beings,

original: spyod pa la mngon par brtson par byas pa'o //
analyzed: spyod pa la mngon par brtson par byas pa'o //
translated: and they are attached to the performance of the practices.

original: gsod pa ni bdun te de'i sbyor ba ni thabs so //
analyzed: gsod pa ni bdun te de'i sbyor ba ni thabs so //
translated: There are seven kinds of killing, and its method is the means.

original: de nyid kyis na chags pa che //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na chags pa che //
translated: Therefore, he is the great attachment.

original: zhes bya'o // de nyid kyis na rdo rje chags pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // de nyid kyis na rdo rje chags pa ste /
translated: Therefore, he is the vajra attachment.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnams shin tu 'jig par byed pa nyid kyis na gang chen por gyur pa ste de yang rdo rje'i don yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnams shin tu 'jig par byed pa nyid kyis na gang chen por gyur pa ste de yang rdo rje'i don yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: Since he is the one who utterly destroys the resistant tendencies, he is the great one, and that is the meaning of vajra.

original: spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pas rdo rje rnams kyis legs pa yin pas na rdo rje legs pa ste /
analyzed: spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pas rdo rje rnams kyis legs pa yin pas na rdo rje legs pa ste /
translated: He is the vajra good, since he is the good of the vajras, due to the completion of the practices.

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rim pa bzhin du bdag dang gzhan gyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i bsngags pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rim pa bzhin du bdag dang gzhan gyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i bsngags pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is the praise of the completion of the practices of self and others by the buddhas and bodhisattvas, respectively.

original: gang byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid la gnas pa rnams ni /
analyzed: gang byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid la gnas pa rnams ni /
translated: Those who abide in the reality of the bodhisattva

original: byang chub kyi sems la brten nas snying rje sngon du 'gro ba'i sems dang ldan pa la ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi las rnams dang sbyor ba thams cad yod de /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems la brten nas snying rje sngon du 'gro ba'i sems dang ldan pa la ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi las rnams dang sbyor ba thams cad yod de /
translated: For one who has the thought preceded by compassion in dependence on the Thought of Enlightenment, all the actions of body, speech, and mind and all the practices exist.

original: de'i spyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de nyid ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: de'i spyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de nyid ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi de kho na nyid do //
translated: That perfection of generosity of his is the reality of Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: de'i rab tu dbye ba ni spyin pa rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: de'i rab tu dbye ba ni spyin pa rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: Its divisions are the four kinds of generosity:

original: zang zing dang mi 'jigs pa dang / byams pa dang / chos kyi spyin pa rnams so //
analyzed: zang zing dang mi 'jigs pa dang / byams pa dang / chos kyi spyin pa rnams so //
translated: the generosity of material things, of fearlessness, of love, and of the Dharma.

original: de nyid ni rim pa bzhin du sems dpa' rnam pa bzhi yin te /
analyzed: de nyid ni rim pa bzhin du sems dpa' rnam pa bzhi yin te /
translated: Those are the four kinds of heroes, respectively:

original: rin chen dang / nyi ma dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bzhad pa'o //
analyzed: rin chen dang / nyi ma dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bzhad pa'o //
translated: Ratna, Sūrya, Dhvaja, and Hasita.

original: de rnams kyang 'khor los sgyur ba rnams kyi dbang phyug gi mthu'i tog dang / skye dgu rnams chos la 'jog pa de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyang 'khor los sgyur ba rnams kyi dbang phyug gi mthu'i tog dang / skye dgu rnams chos la 'jog pa de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
translated: They should be understood as the power of sovereignty of the universal monarchs, the crest-jewel, and the establishment of the people in the Dharma.

original: de dag gi dbang du mdzad nas byang chub sems dpa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de dag gi dbang du mdzad nas byang chub sems dpa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: With reference to them, he says, “the bodhisattva, etc.”

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i gnas skabs kyi zang zing gi spyin pa gang yin pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin te mtha' yas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i gnas skabs kyi zang zing gi spyin pa gang yin pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin te mtha' yas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The generosity of material things in the states of cause and effect of all the buddhas is equal to space, because it is infinite.

original: rdo rje las byung ba yin te byang chub kyi sems la brten pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje las byung ba yin te byang chub kyi sems la brten pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is born of the vajra, because it is based on the spirit of enlightenment.

original: don yod pa ni nges pa kho nar bya ba byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don yod pa ni nges pa kho nar bya ba byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is meaningful, because it is always effective.

original: rin @141b chen chen po yang yin te phun sum tshogs pa thams cad skyed par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rin @141b chen chen po yang yin te phun sum tshogs pa thams cad skyed par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is a great jewel, because it produces all perfections.

original: yid bzhin gyi rin po che de ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin chen te /
analyzed: yid bzhin gyi rin po che de ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin chen te /
translated: That wish-fulfilling jewel is the Blessed Vajraratna.

original: don yod pa nyid dang / rdo rje don yod dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra ba'i rin po che'i don yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: don yod pa nyid dang / rdo rje don yod dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra ba'i rin po che'i don yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The meaning of “meaningful” is the same as the meaning of “vajra” and the meaning of “wish-fulfilling jewel.”

original: yang na rdo rje rnams kyi rdo rje las byung ba ni rdo rje rin chen no //
analyzed: yang na rdo rje rnams kyi rdo rje las byung ba ni rdo rje rin chen no //
translated: Or else, the jewel of the vajra is the one who has arisen from the vajra of the vajras.

original: chos kyi dbyings kun du  'gro ba la sogs pa'i don la gang nyon mongs pa'i mi shes pa gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa ste /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kun du  'gro ba la sogs pa'i don la gang nyon mongs pa'i mi shes pa gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa ste /
translated: The ignorance that is the afflictive obscuration with regard to the meaning of the all-pervading dharmadhatu and so forth is ignorance.

original: de dang bral ba ni de bsal ba ste /
analyzed: de dang bral ba ni de bsal ba ste /
translated: Being free from that is being free from that.

original: 'khor ba lam gyi nyon mongs pa'i tshogs de spangs pa ni de las nges par byung ba ste /
analyzed: 'khor ba lam gyi nyon mongs pa'i tshogs de spangs pa ni de las nges par byung ba ste /
translated: Being free from the afflictive obscurations of samsara is being free from that.

original: gang 'di lta bu'i ye shes spros pa med cing zag pa med pa de ni rdo rje nyi ma ste /
analyzed: gang 'di lta bu'i ye shes spros pa med cing zag pa med pa de ni rdo rje nyi ma ste /
translated: The unfabricated, untainted wisdom that is like that is the vajra sun.

original: des byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba rnams kyi ma rig pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams las mi 'jigs pa stsol te /
analyzed: des byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba rnams kyi ma rig pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams las mi 'jigs pa stsol te /
translated: By that, the bodhisattvas who are disciplined are given protection from ignorance and the afflictions.

original: 'khor los sgyur ba ltar rang gi gzi byin gyis skye dgu rnams mi mthun pa'i phyogs las skyob bar byed de de bas na bcom ldan 'das 'di ni mi 'jigs pa spyin pa yin te /
analyzed: 'khor los sgyur ba ltar rang gi gzi byin gyis skye dgu rnams mi mthun pa'i phyogs las skyob bar byed de de bas na bcom ldan 'das 'di ni mi 'jigs pa spyin pa yin te /
translated: Like a chakravartin, by his own splendor he protects living beings from unfavorable conditions. Therefore, this Bhagavat is the giver of protection.

original: nyon mongs pa dang ma rig pa spangs pa ni thar pa ste /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa dang ma rig pa spangs pa ni thar pa ste /
translated: The abandonment of the afflictions and ignorance is liberation.

original: de'i don ni snang ba zhes bya ste yang dag pa'i ye shes can gyi snang ba'o //
analyzed: de'i don ni snang ba zhes bya ste yang dag pa'i ye shes can gyi snang ba'o //
translated: Its meaning is “appearance,” the appearance of one who has right pristine awareness.

original: de nyid ni gzi brjid chen po ste de nyid rdo rje nyi ma'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni gzi brjid chen po ste de nyid rdo rje nyi ma'o //
translated: That itself is “great splendor,” that itself is the Vajra Sun.

original: chen po ni rdo rje'i don to //
analyzed: chen po ni rdo rje'i don to //
translated: “ Great” has the meaning of “vajra.”

original: gzi brjid ni nyi ma'i don yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: gzi brjid ni nyi ma'i don yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: “ Splendor” has the meaning of “sun,” is what is intended.

original: yang na bdag blo zla ltar snang //
analyzed: yang na bdag blo zla ltar snang //
translated: Or else, the mind is like the moon,

original: rdo rje zhes ni bya bar bshad //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes ni bya bar bshad //
translated: and is explained as “vajra.”

original: ces gsungs pas rdo rje ni byang chub kyi lam mo //
analyzed: ces gsungs pas rdo rje ni byang chub kyi lam mo //
translated: Since it is said, “vajra” is the path to enlightenment.

original: de nyid ni nyi ma yin te de dang chos mthun pas na rdo rje nyi ma'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni nyi ma yin te de dang chos mthun pas na rdo rje nyi ma'o //
translated: That itself is the sun, and because it has that in common, it is the Vajra Sun.

original: byang chub kyi lam gyi rnam pa ni rtags dang mtshan ma dang / don rtags dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i ye shes dang / sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi lam gyi rnam pa ni rtags dang mtshan ma dang / don rtags dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i ye shes dang / sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs pa'o //
translated: The aspects of the path to enlightenment are the signs and marks, the sign of the meaning, suchness, right pristine awareness, mantra, seal, and so on.

original: rnam pa yang yin la kun yang yin pas na rnam pa kun te /
analyzed: rnam pa yang yin la kun yang yin pas na rnam pa kun te /
translated: And since it is an aspect and all, it is all aspects.

original: de rnams kyi dngos po gdul bya rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud la ston par mdzad pa'i stobs kyis sprul par byed pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de ni thar pa ste byang chub bo //
analyzed: de rnams kyi dngos po gdul bya rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud la ston par mdzad pa'i stobs kyis sprul par byed pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de ni thar pa ste byang chub bo //
translated: The wisdom that emanates through the power of teaching those things in the mindstreams of disciples is liberation, i.e., enlightenment.

original: de'i lam ni spros pa med pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: de'i lam ni spros pa med pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The path to that is the wisdom free of conceptual elaboration.

original: der 'jug pa ni sbyor ba'i lam ste de ni thar pa'i lam du 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: der 'jug pa ni sbyor ba'i lam ste de ni thar pa'i lam du 'jug pa'o //
translated: The entry to that is the path of preparation, for that is the entry to the path of liberation.

original: de thob par mdzad pa ni gdul bya rnams kyi rgyud la skyed par @142a * //
analyzed: de thob par mdzad pa ni gdul bya rnams kyi rgyud la skyed par @142a * //
translated: The attainment of that is the generation of that path in the mindstreams of disciples.

original: mdzad pa'o // chos ni byang chub kyi lam ste de'i rgyal mtshan ston par byed pa'o //
analyzed: mdzad pa'o // chos ni byang chub kyi lam ste de'i rgyal mtshan ston par byed pa'o //
translated: The Dharma is the path to enlightenment, and he displays the banner of that.

original: de nyid kyis na rtog pa chen po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na rtog pa chen po zhes bya'o //
translated: For that very reason, he is called the great imagination.

original: yang na rdo rje ni byang chub kyi lam ste de'i tog yin pas na rdo rje dpal lo //
analyzed: yang na rdo rje ni byang chub kyi lam ste de'i tog yin pas na rdo rje dpal lo //
translated: Or else, the vajra is the path to enlightenment, and since he is the crest-jewel of that, he is Vajraśrī.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byams pa'i rang bzhin gyi spyin pa ste sangs rgyas kyi lam ston par mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byams pa'i rang bzhin gyi spyin pa ste sangs rgyas kyi lam ston par mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is the generosity of the nature of love, O Blessed One, because it teaches the path to enlightenment.

original: gdul bya rnams kyi rgyud la mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i byang chub kyi lam skyed par mdzad pa'i ye shes ni byams pa'i spyin pa'o //
analyzed: gdul bya rnams kyi rgyud la mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i byang chub kyi lam skyed par mdzad pa'i ye shes ni byams pa'i spyin pa'o //
translated: The intuition that generates the path to enlightenment with signs in the mindstreams of those to be trained is the giving of love.

original: mtshan ma med pa'i byang chub kyi lam skyed par mdzad pa'i ye shes ni chos kyi spyin pa ste /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa'i byang chub kyi lam skyed par mdzad pa'i ye shes ni chos kyi spyin pa ste /
translated: The intuition that generates the path to enlightenment without signs is the giving of the Dharma.

original: de ni rdo rje bzhad pa zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor chen po'o //
analyzed: de ni rdo rje bzhad pa zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor chen po'o //
translated: This is the great yoga called the Vajra Laughter.

original: 'di la ci'i phyir rdo rje bzhad pa zhes bya zhe na /
analyzed: 'di la ci'i phyir rdo rje bzhad pa zhes bya zhe na /
translated: Why is it called the Vajra Laughter?

original: gang gi phyir sangs rgyas kun gyi 'dzum pa rmad du byung ba'i rgyu yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir sangs rgyas kun gyi 'dzum pa rmad du byung ba'i rgyu yin te /
translated: Because it is the cause of the marvelous smile of all the Buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi 'dzum pa des kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la dbugs 'byin pa chen po'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi 'dzum pa des kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la dbugs 'byin pa chen po'i rgyu yin no //
translated: And by that smile of the Buddha, the Bodhisattvas are greatly refreshed.

original: de bas na rdo rje bzhad pa ni dbugs 'byin pa chen po yin no //
analyzed: de bas na rdo rje bzhad pa ni dbugs 'byin pa chen po yin no //
translated: Therefore, the Vajra Laughter is the great refreshment.

original: byang chub kyi lam rnam pa gsum dang de'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid so sor rtog pa dang bcas par 'dus pa'i ye shes ni bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi lam rnam pa gsum dang de'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid so sor rtog pa dang bcas par 'dus pa'i ye shes ni bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
translated: The gnosis of the assembly, together with the discernment of the three aspects of the path of enlightenment and the nature of its result, is the Bhagavat Amitābha.

original: de'i rab tu phye ba ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: de'i rab tu phye ba ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: Its analysis is fourfold:

original: 'bras bur gyur pas dag pa dang / lam sbyong bar byed pa'i rnam pa med pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa dang / sngags rnam par yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: 'bras bur gyur pas dag pa dang / lam sbyong bar byed pa'i rnam pa med pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa dang / sngags rnam par yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: the pure one that is the result, the formless one that purifies the path, the maṇḍala aspect, and the mantra aspect.

original: de nyid ni rim pa bzhin du sems dpa' bzhi ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni rim pa bzhin du sems dpa' bzhi ste /
translated: Those are, in order, the four heroes:

original: chos dang / rnon po dang / rgyu dang / smra ba'o //
analyzed: chos dang / rnon po dang / rgyu dang / smra ba'o //
translated: the Dharma, the sharp one, the cause, and the speaker.

original: de rnams kyi dbang du byas nas /
analyzed: de rnams kyi dbang du byas nas /
translated: With respect to them,🔽it is said:

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: “All buddhas” and so on.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dag pa //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dag pa //
translated: The pure Dharma of the tathāgatas

original: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid ni ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa dang / rang bzhin gyi sgrib pa thams cad zad pa gang yin pa de ni rdo rje rnams kyi chos yin pas na rdo rje chos zhes bshad do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid ni ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa dang / rang bzhin gyi sgrib pa thams cad zad pa gang yin pa de ni rdo rje rnams kyi chos yin pas na rdo rje chos zhes bshad do //
translated: The reality of the Buddha qualities is the intrinsic purity and the exhaustion of all the obscurations by nature. Since that is the reality of the vajras, it is explained as the vajra reality.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid dag pa de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid dag pa de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The samādhi that observes that intrinsic purity is also called that.

original: de nyid kyis na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la rnal 'byor chen po yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la rnal 'byor chen po yin no //
translated: And by that very fact, it is the great yoga with regard to the Buddha qualities.

original: sangs rgyas chos ni rtogs mdzad pa //🔽zhes bya ba ni 'thob par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas chos ni rtogs mdzad pa // zhes bya ba ni 'thob par mdzad pa'o //
translated: The realization of the Buddha qualities🔽is the vajra sharpness.

original: rdo rje yang yin la rnon po yang yin pas rdo rje rnon po ste /
analyzed: rdo rje yang yin la rnon po yang yin pas rdo rje rnon po ste /
translated: It is a vajra and it is sharp, hence it is vajra sharpness.

original: de lta bu'i @142b rdo rje rnon po gang yin pa de ni rdo rje rnon por de bshad do zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i @142b rdo rje rnon po gang yin pa de ni rdo rje rnon por de bshad do zhes bya'o //
translated: That which is such a vajra sharpness is explained as the vajra sharpness.

original: de yang rdo rje'i don ni theg pa chen po'i spros pa med pa'i ye shes zla ba dag pa ltar snang ba'o //
analyzed: de yang rdo rje'i don ni theg pa chen po'i spros pa med pa'i ye shes zla ba dag pa ltar snang ba'o //
translated: Moreover, the meaning of vajra is the wisdom of the unelaborated Mahāyāna, which appears like a pure moon.

original: rnon po'i don ni sgrib pa gnyis gcod par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rnon po'i don ni sgrib pa gnyis gcod par byed pa'o //
translated: The meaning of “sharp” is that it cuts the two obscurations.

original: des gcod mdzad ces bya ba ni gcod par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: des gcod mdzad ces bya ba ni gcod par mdzad pa'o //
translated: “It cuts” means it cuts.

original: gcod pa po zhes bya ba ni gcod pa por gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gcod pa po zhes bya ba ni gcod pa por gyur pa'o //
translated: “The cutter” means the one who cuts.

original: sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams te /
analyzed: sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams te /
translated: The great beings are the buddhas and bodhisattvas.

original: de'i bdag nyid can gyi theg pa chen po gang yin pa de ni rdo rje rgyu ste /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid can gyi theg pa chen po gang yin pa de ni rdo rje rgyu ste /
translated: The Great Vehicle that has that nature is the vajra cause.

original: rdo rje ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams yin la de'i bdag nyid can gyi rgyu yin pas na rdo rje rgyu zhes bya bar dgongs te /
analyzed: rdo rje ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams yin la de'i bdag nyid can gyi rgyu yin pas na rdo rje rgyu zhes bya bar dgongs te /
translated: The vajras are the buddhas and bodhisattvas, and because it is the cause that has their nature, it is called the vajra cause.

original: phan par byed pa dang / rgyu dang theg pa zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs yin no //
analyzed: phan par byed pa dang / rgyu dang theg pa zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs yin no //
translated: The terms “beneficial,” “cause,” and “vehicle” are synonyms.

original: gzhan yang rdo rje rnams kyi rgyu sprul pas na spros pa med pa nyid kyi ye shes ni theg pa chen po ste sems dpa' ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan yang rdo rje rnams kyi rgyu sprul pas na spros pa med pa nyid kyi ye shes ni theg pa chen po ste sems dpa' ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Moreover, if the wisdom of non-conceptuality is the Great Vehicle because it is the cause of the vajras, it is not the being.

original: chos kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: chos kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: To that, he says “the Dharma,” and so on.

original: chos thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pas na chos ni sangs rgyas kyi thar pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pas na chos ni sangs rgyas kyi thar pa'o //
translated: Since it is the supreme of all Dharmas, the Dharma is the liberation of the Buddha.

original: 'dir de thob par byed pa'i lam nyid la de'i don gyi chos zhes bshad de /
analyzed: 'dir de thob par byed pa'i lam nyid la de'i don gyi chos zhes bshad de /
translated: Here, the path itself that causes one to attain that is explained as the Dharma of that meaning.

original: de yang spros pa med pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: de yang spros pa med pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
translated: Moreover, that is the wisdom of non-conceptuality.

original: gdul bya rnams kyi rgyud la 'pho bas na 'khor lo ste /
analyzed: gdul bya rnams kyi rgyud la 'pho bas na 'khor lo ste /
translated: Since it is transferred into the mind-streams of those to be tamed, it is a wheel.

original: chos kyang yin la 'khor lo yang yin pas chos kyi 'khor lo ste de nyid bskor ba de ni rdo rje rgyu'o //
analyzed: chos kyang yin la 'khor lo yang yin pas chos kyi 'khor lo ste de nyid bskor ba de ni rdo rje rgyu'o //
translated: Since it is both Dharma and a wheel, it is the wheel of Dharma. That which is turned is the vajra cause.

original: de ltar na sems dpa' rdo rje ji ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar na sems dpa' rdo rje ji ltar yin zhe na /
translated: In that case, how is one a hero of the vajra?

original: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The Bhagavān declares, “the play of the Buddhas,” and so on.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi rol mo ni rnam pa med pa'i chos sems dpa'i rnam par yang dag par ston par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi rol mo ni rnam pa med pa'i chos sems dpa'i rnam par yang dag par ston par mdzad pa'o //
translated: The play of the Buddhas is the display of the form of the hero, the Dharma that is without aspect.

original: de nyid ni 'khor lo ste de ni chos kyi 'khor lo yin no zhes bya ba ni sgra'i don ston to //
analyzed: de nyid ni 'khor lo ste de ni chos kyi 'khor lo yin no zhes bya ba ni sgra'i don ston to //
translated: That itself is the wheel, and that is the wheel of Dharma. This teaches the meaning of the words.🔽Moreover, in the glorious Vajra Peak Tantra,

original: de yang dpal rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud las /
analyzed: de yang dpal rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud las /
translated: it is said:

original: ngo bo nyid kyi sku yis ni //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyi sku yis ni //
translated: The essential body

original: rab tu snang ba 'byung 'gyur la //
analyzed: rab tu snang ba 'byung 'gyur la //
translated: is the source of the light.

original: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yis ni //
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yis ni //
translated: The body of perfect rapture

original: chos kyi longs spyod 'di 'dra'o ;
analyzed: chos kyi longs spyod 'di 'dra'o ;
translated: is the enjoyment of the Dharma.

original: / rtsom la gnas pa thams cad ni //
analyzed: / rtsom la gnas pa thams cad ni //
translated: All the abodes of the creative process

original: zhi zhing phra la blta bar dka' //
analyzed: zhi zhing phra la blta bar dka' //
translated: are peaceful, subtle, and hard to see.

original: sangs rgyas rnams ni thugs brtse bas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams ni thugs brtse bas //
translated: The Buddhas, out of compassion,

original: sangs rgyas rol mo ston pa yin //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rol mo ston pa yin // zhes gsungs so //
translated: display the play of Buddhahood.

original: 'jam pa yang yin la gsung yang yin pas na 'jam pa'i gsung ste /🔽de'i bdag nyid kyi @143a * //
analyzed: 'jam pa yang yin la gsung yang yin pas na 'jam pa'i gsung ste / de'i bdag nyid kyi @143a * //
translated: It is a gentle speech, and it is a speech, thus it is a gentle speech.

original: sems dpa' ni rdo rje smra ba'o //
analyzed: sems dpa' ni rdo rje smra ba'o //
translated: The being whose nature is that is Vajra Speech.

original: 'jam pa'i gsung de su zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'jam pa'i gsung de su zhig yin zhe na /
translated: Who is that gentle speech?

original: gsung zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: gsung zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: It is the speech.

original: de ci sgra yin nam 'on te ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: de ci sgra yin nam 'on te ma yin zhe na /
translated: Is it a sound or not?

original: sgra ni rnam par spangs par zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: sgra ni rnam par spangs par zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: It is said to be a sound that is abandoned.

original: de ci byis pa rnams khong nas smra ba lta bu yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: de ci byis pa rnams khong nas smra ba lta bu yin nam zhe na /
translated: Is it like the speech of childish beings?

original: ma yin te dag pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: ma yin te dag pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: No, it is said to be pure.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu mthun pa'o zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu mthun pa'o zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: It is the natural outcome of supramundane wisdom.

original: de yang shes rab dang ye shes kyi rang bzhin te don dam par nges par brtags pa nyid kyis na shes rab zab bo //
analyzed: de yang shes rab dang ye shes kyi rang bzhin te don dam par nges par brtags pa nyid kyis na shes rab zab bo //
translated: It is also the nature of wisdom and knowledge, and it is profound wisdom because it is the ultimate investigation itself.

original: yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu mthun pa nyid yin pas na shes rab dang ye shes te /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu mthun pa nyid yin pas na shes rab dang ye shes te /
translated: It is wisdom and knowledge because it is the natural outcome of perfect knowledge.

original: de'i rang bzhin ni de'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin ni de'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: Its nature is that which has the essence of that.

original: dag pa ni 'jig rten pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dag pa ni 'jig rten pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is pure, which means mundane wisdom.

original: de yang gang gi phyir gsung nyid kyis na 'jam pa'i gsung ste /
analyzed: de yang gang gi phyir gsung nyid kyis na 'jam pa'i gsung ste /
translated: And it is gentle speech because it is speech itself.

original: de nyid kyis na dag pa nyid ni 'jam pa'i gsung ngo //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na dag pa nyid ni 'jam pa'i gsung ngo //
translated: It is gentle speech because it is pure itself.

original: rang gi don la btang snyoms su 'jog pas gzhan gyi byang chub sgrub par byed pa'i lam ni don yod par grub pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi don la btang snyoms su 'jog pas gzhan gyi byang chub sgrub par byed pa'i lam ni don yod par grub pa'o //
translated: It is Amoghasiddhi, the path that accomplishes the enlightenment of others by remaining indifferent to one's own goal.

original: de'i rab tu byed pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: de'i rab tu byed pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: Its function is fourfold.

original: rtsom pa dang / yongs su spyang ba dang / so sor rtog pa dang / sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rtsom pa dang / yongs su spyang ba dang / so sor rtog pa dang / sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: Composing, purifying, discerning, and accomplishing.

original: de nyid ni rim bzhin du sems dpa' rnam pa bzhi ste las dang bsrung ba dang gnod spyin dang khu tshur ro //
analyzed: de nyid ni rim bzhin du sems dpa' rnam pa bzhi ste las dang bsrung ba dang gnod spyin dang khu tshur ro //
translated: These are the four kinds of heroes, in order, the action, protection, yakṣa, and fist heroes.

original: de dag gi dbang du mdzad nas pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de dag gi dbang du mdzad nas pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: With reference to them, he declares the perfection, etc.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa kun ni spyin pa la sogs pa rnam pa lnga'o //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa kun ni spyin pa la sogs pa rnam pa lnga'o //
translated: The perfections are the five beginning with generosity.

original: de rnams kyi rkang pa ni gzhan rnams la bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rkang pa ni gzhan rnams la bskyed pa'o //
translated: Their feet are the generation of the others.

original: chos rnams thams cad ston mdzad pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skyed par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad ston mdzad pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skyed par mdzad pa'o //
translated: The teaching of all dharmas is the generation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di nyid kyi tshogs kyis 'bras bu skyed pa ni sems can kun don sgrub pa po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid kyi tshogs kyis 'bras bu skyed pa ni sems can kun don sgrub pa po zhes bya'o //
translated: The accomplishment of the aims of all beings is the generation of the result of this very accumulation.

original: rdo rje ni gzhan gyi byang chub pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje ni gzhan gyi byang chub pa ste /
translated: The vajra is the generation of the other’s awakening.

original: de'i las yin pas na rdo rje las zhes bya bar dgongs te 'di ni gzhan gyi don gyi rtsom pa'o //
analyzed: de'i las yin pas na rdo rje las zhes bya bar dgongs te 'di ni gzhan gyi don gyi rtsom pa'o //
translated: Since it is the action of that, it is considered to be the vajra action. This is the composition for the benefit of others.

original: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la sangs rgyas rnams kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i dran pa ni rjes su dran pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la sangs rgyas rnams kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i dran pa ni rjes su dran pa ste /
translated: The recollection that follows the buddhas is recollection of the buddhas.

original: de'i yang dag par grub pa ni theg pa dman pa rnam par spangs pa dang / byang chub kyi sems la rtag tu zhugs pa ste /
analyzed: de'i yang dag par grub pa ni theg pa dman pa rnam par spangs pa dang / byang chub kyi sems la rtag tu zhugs pa ste /
translated: Its perfect accomplishment is the abandonment of the lesser vehicle and the constant engagement in the thought of awakening.

original: las 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsrung ba yin pas na de'i phyir rdo rje bsrung ba ste /
analyzed: las 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsrung ba yin pas na de'i phyir rdo rje bsrung ba ste /
translated: Since this action is the protection of the bodhisattvas, it is therefore the vajra protection.

original: 'di nyid ni yongs su @143b spyang ba'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid ni yongs su @143b spyang ba'o //
translated: This is the thorough purification.

original: gzhan rnams kyi sdig pa rnams za bar byed cing /
analyzed: gzhan rnams kyi sdig pa rnams za bar byed cing /
translated: It devours the sins of others and

original: nyon mongs pa rnams sreg pa ni rdo rje gnod spyin no //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa rnams sreg pa ni rdo rje gnod spyin no //
translated: burns their afflictions, which is the vajra yakṣa.🔽How so?

original: ji ltar zhe na /🔽nyon mongs zad pas nyer len pas //
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na / nyon mongs zad pas nyer len pas //
translated: It is said:

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: By the exhaustion of afflictions, it appropriates.

original: nyon mongs pas na nyon mongs pa ste sdig pa la sogs pa dang nyon mongs pa rnams so //
analyzed: nyon mongs pas na nyon mongs pa ste sdig pa la sogs pa dang nyon mongs pa rnams so //
translated: Afflicted by afflictions, that is, by sins and so on and by afflictions.

original: rdo rje'i don ni de rnams zad pa la brten nas /
analyzed: rdo rje'i don ni de rnams zad pa la brten nas /
translated: The meaning of vajra is their exhaustion.

original: rdo rje rnams kyi zad pa yin pas na rdo rje gnod spyin te /
analyzed: rdo rje rnams kyi zad pa yin pas na rdo rje gnod spyin te /
translated: Since it is the exhaustion of the vajras, it is the vajra yakṣa.

original: yi ge gnyis go bzlog pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yi ge gnyis go bzlog pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the two syllables reversed is the meaning of the two syllables reversed.

original: gzhan yang rdo rje rnams kyi gnod spyin yin pas na rdo rje gnod spyin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang rdo rje rnams kyi gnod spyin yin pas na rdo rje gnod spyin te /
translated: Moreover, since it is the yakṣa of the vajras, it is the vajra yakṣa.

original: bha gar byas pa 'di ni so sor rtog pa'i 'phags pa'i lam gyis zag pa med pa'i tshogs dang ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa zad pa thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bha gar byas pa 'di ni so sor rtog pa'i 'phags pa'i lam gyis zag pa med pa'i tshogs dang ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa zad pa thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is the bhaga, because it is the attainment of the exhaustion of afflictions endowed with the undefiled aggregates by means of the noble path of discrimination.

original: sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje rnams bcings pa ni /
analyzed: sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje rnams bcings pa ni /
translated: The binding of the vajras of body and so on

original: de kho na nyid du nges par bsdus shing yang dag par gnas pa ni rdo rje khu tshur ro //
analyzed: de kho na nyid du nges par bsdus shing yang dag par gnas pa ni rdo rje khu tshur ro //
translated: is the vajra fist, which is definitely collected into reality and abides correctly.

original: rnal 'byor pa'i sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje ni rdo rje ste de rnams kyi khu tshur ni de kho na nyid du bsdus pa'o zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa'i sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje ni rdo rje ste de rnams kyi khu tshur ni de kho na nyid du bsdus pa'o zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
translated: The vajra of the body, etc. of the yogi is the vajra fist, which is the gathering of all things into reality.

original: gzhan yang / de nyid de nyid ye shes te //
analyzed: gzhan yang / de nyid de nyid ye shes te //
translated: Thatness is the knowledge of thatness.

original: zhes bya ba'i ye shes 'di ni rdo rje khu tshur te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i ye shes 'di ni rdo rje khu tshur te /
translated: This knowledge is the vajra fist.

original: de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes ni rdo rje ste de'i khu tshur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes ni rdo rje ste de'i khu tshur ro //
translated: The knowledge of reality is the vajra, and that is the fist.

original: de nyid ces bya ba gnyis pas ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis ba sten par bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba gnyis pas ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis ba sten par bya'o //
translated: The second “thatness” means that the yogi should practice it.

original: de zhes bya ba ni mchog tu brten par byas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni mchog tu brten par byas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The “that” means that it should be practiced supremely.

original: 'di rnams yang dag par sgrub pa ni las bzhi pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di rnams yang dag par sgrub pa ni las bzhi pa yin no //
translated: The accomplishment of these is the fourth action.

original: sems dpa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi de kho na nyid bshad pa'o //
analyzed: sems dpa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi de kho na nyid bshad pa'o //
translated: This is the explanation of the reality of the bodhisattva vajra fist.

original: de ni dam tshig phyag rgya'i yang de kho na nyid yin no zhes shes te /
analyzed: de ni dam tshig phyag rgya'i yang de kho na nyid yin no zhes shes te /
translated: One should know that this is also the reality of the pledge seal.

original: de'i nye bar 'byung ba yang gang zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: de'i nye bar 'byung ba yang gang zhig yin zhe na /
translated: What is its origin?

original: dam tshig phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: dam tshig phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: The pledge seal is called the “great seal.”

original: de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyi yang de dang 'dra ba yin la //
analyzed: de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyi yang de dang 'dra ba yin la //
translated: Then, the action seals are the same as those.

original: phyag rgya chen po'i nye bar 'byung ba yang gang zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i nye bar 'byung ba yang gang zhig yin zhe na /
translated: What is the arising of the great seal?

original: rdo rje khu tshur zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The vajra fist and so forth are taught.

original: las lhag ma zhes shugs kyis shes par bya ste /
analyzed: las lhag ma zhes shugs kyis shes par bya ste /
translated: The remaining actions are to be understood by implication.

original: mtshan ma la sogs pa de nyid ni phyag rgya chen po yin no zhes kyang shugs kyis go bar bya'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma la sogs pa de nyid ni phyag rgya chen po yin no zhes kyang shugs kyis go bar bya'o //
translated: That very sign and so forth is the great seal, which is also to be understood by implication.

original: de la rdo rje khu tshur gyi don gsungs nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ba stan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de la rdo rje khu tshur gyi don gsungs nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ba stan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Therein, having taught the meaning of the vajra fist, in order to teach the vajra being,

original: nga rgyal med cing zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /🔽gang bdag med pas chos thams cad kyi mnyam @144a * //
analyzed: nga rgyal med cing zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te / gang bdag med pas chos thams cad kyi mnyam @144a * //
translated: it is said, “without pride” and so forth.🔽That which is the wisdom of the sameness of all phenomena due to selflessness

original: pa nyid kyi ye shes ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: pa nyid kyi ye shes ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
translated: is the vajra being.

original: bdag med pa ni rdo rje'i don yin te /
analyzed: bdag med pa ni rdo rje'i don yin te /
translated: Selflessness is the meaning of vajra.

original: stong pa nyid ni rdo rjer bshad //
analyzed: stong pa nyid ni rdo rjer bshad //
translated: Emptiness is explained as the vajra.

original: ces gsungs pa'i phyir mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyang rdo rje'i don yin par dgongs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs pa'i phyir mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyang rdo rje'i don yin par dgongs so //
translated: Thus, the wisdom of equality is also considered to be the meaning of vajra.

original: stong pa nyid la sogs pa ni chos rnams kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la sogs pa ni chos rnams kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid de /
translated: Emptiness and so on are the general characteristics of phenomena.

original: de nyid de rnams kyis mthong bas ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: de nyid de rnams kyis mthong bas ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
translated: Since that is seen by them, it is the wisdom of equality.

original: ye shes de ji lta bu yin zhe na /
analyzed: ye shes de ji lta bu yin zhe na /
translated: What is that wisdom like?

original: zhen pa med pa ste zhen pa ni khyad par gyi mtshan nyid rnams te /
analyzed: zhen pa med pa ste zhen pa ni khyad par gyi mtshan nyid rnams te /
translated: It is nonattachment, because attachment is the specific characteristics of phenomena.

original: de rnams so sor snang ba med pas na zhen pa med pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams so sor snang ba med pas na zhen pa med pa ste /
translated: Since those do not appear individually, it is nonattachment.

original: 'di ni ba stan pa yin la lhag ma rnams ni bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni ba stan pa yin la lhag ma rnams ni bshad pa yin no //
translated: This is the statement, and the rest is the explanation.

original: gang zag pa dmigs su med pas na nga rgyal med pa'o //
analyzed: gang zag pa dmigs su med pas na nga rgyal med pa'o //
translated: It is without pride, because the person is not observed.

original: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i so sor snang ba nub pas na snang ba med pa'o //
analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i so sor snang ba nub pas na snang ba med pa'o //
translated: It is without appearance, because the appearance of apprehendeds and apprehenders has subsided.

original: brjod pa dang brjod par bya ba mi dmigs pas na mtshan ma med pa'o //
analyzed: brjod pa dang brjod par bya ba mi dmigs pas na mtshan ma med pa'o //
translated: It is signless, because expression and the expressed are not observed.

original: de nyid kyis na rdo rje bsdams pas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ba stan nas mthe bo gnyis ring du zhugs pas de kho na nyid kyi don bshad la /
analyzed: de nyid kyis na rdo rje bsdams pas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ba stan nas mthe bo gnyis ring du zhugs pas de kho na nyid kyi don bshad la /
translated: Therefore, the vajra fist is taught to be the wisdom of equality, and the two thumbs extended explain the meaning of reality.

original: de rgyab tu rang gi mdzub mo'i sen mo btsir bas mchog nyid du ba stan pa'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje khu tshur ro //🔽rdo rje'i lha mo rnams kyi de kho na nyid du gsungs nas /
analyzed: de rgyab tu rang gi mdzub mo'i sen mo btsir bas mchog nyid du ba stan pa'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje khu tshur ro // rdo rje'i lha mo rnams kyi de kho na nyid du gsungs nas /
translated: The supreme is taught by pressing the nail of one's index finger behind it.🔽Having taught the reality of the vajra goddesses,

original: rdo rje lha mo rnams kyi de kho na nyid ba stan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rdo rje lha mo rnams kyi de kho na nyid ba stan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach the reality of the vajra goddesses,

original: gsang ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gsang ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: it is said secret and so forth.

original: mnyam par sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid dam dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: mnyam par sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid dam dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Union is reality or the maṇḍala.

original: ye shes pha rol phyin pa ni ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes pha rol phyin pa ni ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the perfection whose nature is wisdom.

original: dge ba ni dag pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba ni dag pa'o //
translated: Virtuous means pure.

original: de nyid lha mo bcu gnyis kyi rnam pas rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid lha mo bcu gnyis kyi rnam pas rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste /
translated: That itself, in the form of the twelve goddesses, is called the vajra perfection.

original: 'od ni 'bar ba'i mdog go //
analyzed: 'od ni 'bar ba'i mdog go //
translated: The light is the color of blazing.

original: de la pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la ni pha rol tu phyin pa bcu ste /
analyzed: de la pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la ni pha rol tu phyin pa bcu ste /
translated: In the Perfection Vehicle, there are ten perfections.🔽And it is said:

original: de yang / spyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus //
analyzed: de yang / spyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus //
translated: Generosity, morality, patience, diligence,

original: bsam gtan shes rab thabs dang ni //
analyzed: bsam gtan shes rab thabs dang ni //
translated: Meditation, wisdom, means,

original: smon lam stobs dang ye shes te //
analyzed: smon lam stobs dang ye shes te //
translated: Aspirations, power, and knowledge

original: 'di dag pha rol phyin pa bcu //🔽zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di dag pha rol phyin pa bcu // zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: are the ten perfections.

original: 'dir stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su byas nas pha rol tu phyin pa bcu gnyis zhes bshad do //
analyzed: 'dir stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su byas nas pha rol tu phyin pa bcu gnyis zhes bshad do //
translated: Here, the perfection of power and the perfection of knowledge are made into two, and it is explained that there are twelve perfections.

original: rdo rje sems ma dang rdo rje rin chen ma ni stobs so //
analyzed: rdo rje sems ma dang rdo rje rin chen ma ni stobs so //
translated: Vajraratna and Vajrasattva are power.🔽Vajradharma and Vajrakarma are knowledge.

original: rdo rje chos ma dang rdo rje las ma ni ye @144b shes yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: rdo rje chos ma dang rdo rje las ma ni ye @144b shes yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: This is the intention.

original: rdo rje sems ma ni byang chub kyi sems las sangs rgyas nyid thob pas rdo rje sems ma ste /
analyzed: rdo rje sems ma ni byang chub kyi sems las sangs rgyas nyid thob pas rdo rje sems ma ste /
translated: Vajrasattva is the attainment of buddhahood from the mind of enlightenment, so it is Vajrasattva.

original: de nyid gsungs pa ni byang chub sems ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa ni byang chub sems ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
translated: The statement of that is “the enlightenment spirit,” etc.

original: ye shes nyid ni sangs rgyas nyid du rnam par dag pa'i pha rol nyid yin la /
analyzed: ye shes nyid ni sangs rgyas nyid du rnam par dag pa'i pha rol nyid yin la /
translated: The very wisdom is the very perfection of the purity of Buddhahood.

original: de son cing 'thob pa yin te de bas na 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de son cing 'thob pa yin te de bas na 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is the arrival and attainment of that, and therefore it has the meaning of “perfection.”

original: pha rol phyin thob ces bya ba ni 'di'i mtshan nyid yin te /
analyzed: pha rol phyin thob ces bya ba ni 'di'i mtshan nyid yin te /
translated: The characteristic of “attaining perfection” is

original: gang gi phyir 'dis sangs rgyas nyid 'thob cing brnyes par shes par bya zhing khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'dis sangs rgyas nyid 'thob cing brnyes par shes par bya zhing khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: because of this, one should know and understand that one attains and obtains Buddhahood.

original: bsdu ba'i dngos po ni spyin pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bsdu ba'i dngos po ni spyin pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The means of attraction are generosity, etc.

original: lnga pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje ste /
analyzed: lnga pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje ste /
translated: The fifth is the perfection of wisdom, the vajra.

original: chos bzhi'i spyin pas gcig tu gyur pa ste /
analyzed: chos bzhi'i spyin pas gcig tu gyur pa ste /
translated: The single one is the gift of the four dharmas.

original: lnga par yang dag par gyur cing ro gcig par gyur pa ni rdo rje rin chen ma'o //
analyzed: lnga par yang dag par gyur cing ro gcig par gyur pa ni rdo rje rin chen ma'o //
translated: The fifth is the vajra jewel, which is the single one and the single taste.

original: gnyis po de dag ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du bsam pa'i stobs dang sbyor ba'i stobs ma yin no //
analyzed: gnyis po de dag ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du bsam pa'i stobs dang sbyor ba'i stobs ma yin no //
translated: These two are not, respectively, the power of thought and the power of application.

original: gsang ba'i mchog ni theg pa chen pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i mchog ni theg pa chen pa'o //
translated: The supreme secret is the Great Vehicle.

original: de'i ye shes chen po ni don dam pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: de'i ye shes chen po ni don dam pa'i ye shes so //
translated: Its great intuition is the intuition of the ultimate.

original: de yang yang dag pa'i ye shes te de'i pha rol ni rnam par dag pa'i mtha'o //
analyzed: de yang yang dag pa'i ye shes te de'i pha rol ni rnam par dag pa'i mtha'o //
translated: And that is the right intuition, and the other shore is the limit of purity.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pas pha rol tu phyin pa chen po ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pas pha rol tu phyin pa chen po ste /
translated: It is the great perfection, having become the essence of the perfection of wisdom.

original: de las byung ba zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya'i gzugs su gyur pa ste /
analyzed: de las byung ba zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya'i gzugs su gyur pa ste /
translated: The arisen from that is the form of the seal.

original: de ni rdo rje chos ma'o //
analyzed: de ni rdo rje chos ma'o //
translated: That is the Vajra Dharma Mother.

original: de la chos ni theg pa chen po ste de yang dag par mkhyen pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la chos ni theg pa chen po ste de yang dag par mkhyen pa'i phyir ro //
translated: There, Dharma is the Great Vehicle, and she is the right intuition of that.

original: bzhi po rnams kyi nang na rgyal por gyur cing dbang thob pa nyid rdo rje ste don yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bzhi po rnams kyi nang na rgyal por gyur cing dbang thob pa nyid rdo rje ste don yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Among the four, she is the queen, and she is the vajra, having obtained power, because she is not empty of the fruit.

original: de bas na rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: Therefore, she is the perfection of the vajra.

original: de nyid kyis na las rnams la dbang thob pas rdo rje las ma'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na las rnams la dbang thob pas rdo rje las ma'o //
translated: Therefore, since he has attained mastery over karma, he is the Karmamudra.

original: de ji ltar ye shes yin zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar ye shes yin zhe na /
translated: How is he gnosis?

original: sbyor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: sbyor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He declares, “The yoga, etc.

original: sbyor ba ni 'gro ba'i don gyi bya ba'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba ni 'gro ba'i don gyi bya ba'o //
translated: ” Yoga is the activity for the sake of migrating beings.

original: de'i thabs ni sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i sku ste /
analyzed: de'i thabs ni sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i sku ste /
translated: The means for that is the body of the Buddha, etc.

original: de rnams su rab tu brtag pa ni sprul pa mdzad pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: de rnams su rab tu brtag pa ni sprul pa mdzad pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The imagination of those is the gnosis of the performance of emanations.

original: de bas na gnyis ka yang ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid yin no //
analyzed: de bas na gnyis ka yang ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid yin no //
translated: Therefore, both are of the nature of gnosis.

original: 'bar ba'i rol pa ni dbang phyug chen po ste de spyin pa'i 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: 'bar ba'i rol pa ni dbang phyug chen po ste de spyin pa'i 'bras bu yin no //
translated: The play of blazing is Mahesvara, and that is the fruit of generosity.

original: tshul khrims ni lus kyi rgyan gyi mchog yin no //
analyzed: tshul khrims ni lus kyi rgyan gyi mchog yin no //
translated: Morality is the supreme ornament of the body.

original: rtogs pa'i dga' ba las yang dag par byung ba'i tshig ni ched du brjod pa ste de ni 'dir glu'o //
analyzed: rtogs pa'i dga' ba las yang dag par byung ba'i tshig ni ched du brjod pa ste de ni 'dir glu'o //
translated: The words that arise from the joy of realization are the exclamations, and that is the song here.

original: de bas na chos la dmigs pa'i bzod pa ni @145a * //
analyzed: de bas na chos la dmigs pa'i bzod pa ni @145a * //
translated: Therefore, the patience that is focused on the Dharma

original: glu yin no //
analyzed: glu yin no //
translated: is the song.

original: gar ni brtson 'grus te phul du byung ba'i las yin no //
analyzed: gar ni brtson 'grus te phul du byung ba'i las yin no //
translated: Dance is effort, which is the supreme activity.

original: myur du zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis myur bar byang chub thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: myur du zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis myur bar byang chub thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Quickly” means that one attains enlightenment quickly by the power of vigor.

original: bdug pa ni thams cad du spro ba dang ro mnyam pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdug pa ni thams cad du spro ba dang ro mnyam pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Incense is the same as all, because of its equal taste.

original: de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is the perfection of wisdom.

original: bsam gtan ni 'dod pa'i khams su skyes kyang 'dod pa'i nyes pas gos par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: bsam gtan ni 'dod pa'i khams su skyes kyang 'dod pa'i nyes pas gos par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Meditation is not soiled by the faults of the desire realm, even though one is born in the desire realm.

original: de bzhin du me tog kyang 'dam gyi dri mas gos par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du me tog kyang 'dam gyi dri mas gos par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, a flower is not soiled by the faults of the mud.

original: de bas na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni me tog ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni me tog ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the perfection of meditation is not a flower.

original: mar me ni phyogs thams cad snang bar byed pa yin te de bzhin du smon lam gyis ni sangs rgyas dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bas snang bar byed pa'i phyir dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sangs rgyas nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'o //
analyzed: mar me ni phyogs thams cad snang bar byed pa yin te de bzhin du smon lam gyis ni sangs rgyas dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bas snang bar byed pa'i phyir dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sangs rgyas nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'o //
translated: A lamp illuminates all directions. In the same way, by a vow one is born in a buddha-field with a buddha, because of the illumination of the roots of virtue, and one dedicates all roots of virtue to buddhahood.

original: thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: The perfection of means is

original: de yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dri ma med pa'i chos kyi sgo ba la 'jog pa ni dri ste /
analyzed: de yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dri ma med pa'i chos kyi sgo ba la 'jog pa ni dri ste /
translated: Moreover, the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas are the door to the immaculate Dharma.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi bag chags kyi dri ngan pa thur du sel bar byed cing kha thur du lta bar byed pas na de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi bag chags kyi dri ngan pa thur du sel bar byed cing kha thur du lta bar byed pas na de skad ces bya'o //
translated: It is called means because it removes the bad smell of the instincts of the counteragent, and because it turns the face downward.

original: sems can dam pa gdul bar bya ba'i thabs yin pas na thabs chen po ste /
analyzed: sems can dam pa gdul bar bya ba'i thabs yin pas na thabs chen po ste /
translated: It is the great means because it is the means for disciplining the highest beings.

original: byang chub dam pa dang 'gro ba'i don ni thabs zhes bya ste /
analyzed: byang chub dam pa dang 'gro ba'i don ni thabs zhes bya ste /
translated: The highest enlightenment and the welfare of the world are called means.

original: de la 'dod pa ni mngon par 'dod pa ste byang chub kyi sems chen po'o //
analyzed: de la 'dod pa ni mngon par 'dod pa ste byang chub kyi sems chen po'o //
translated: Desire is the wish for the great thought of enlightenment.

original: de ni rdo rje lcags kyu ste sangs rgyas rnams spyan 'dren pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni rdo rje lcags kyu ste sangs rgyas rnams spyan 'dren pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the vajra hook, because it summons the Buddhas.

original: gzhan gyi don gyi bya ba spyod par byed pa dang / rang nyid byang chub pa'i phyir spyod pa ni byang chub kyi spyod pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi don gyi bya ba spyod par byed pa dang / rang nyid byang chub pa'i phyir spyod pa ni byang chub kyi spyod pa'o //
translated: The practice of the deeds for the welfare of others and the practice for one's own enlightenment is the practice of enlightenment.

original: de gnyi ga ni rdo rje zhags pa ste sa la 'jug pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de gnyi ga ni rdo rje zhags pa ste sa la 'jug pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Both of them are the vajra hook, because they cause entry into the stages.

original: 'dod pa de la spyod cing brten ba la mi 'gyur ba'i dngos po ni rdo rje lcags sgrog ste rdo rjes bcings pa'i phyir lcags sgrog go //
analyzed: 'dod pa de la spyod cing brten ba la mi 'gyur ba'i dngos po ni rdo rje lcags sgrog ste rdo rjes bcings pa'i phyir lcags sgrog go //
translated: The unchangeable thing in the enjoyment and reliance on that desire is the vajra chain, because it is a chain bound by a vajra.

original: chos rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa la skye ba med cing 'byung ba med la gnyis su med par gyur pas chos thams cad ma skyes pa ste /
analyzed: chos rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa la skye ba med cing 'byung ba med la gnyis su med par gyur pas chos thams cad ma skyes pa ste /
translated: With regard to the Dharma, etc., all dharmas are unborn, because they are non-arisen, non-originated, and non-dual.

original: de nyid kyis na /🔽gdod nas zhi ba mkha' dang mnyam //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na / gdod nas zhi ba mkha' dang mnyam //
translated: By that very fact,

original: zhes bya ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ste /
translated: they are primordially peaceful, equal to space.

original: rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis snang ba tsam nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis snang ba tsam nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are mere appearances by their very nature.

original: de lta bu'i tshig la 'jug pa ni rdo rje dril bu ste /
analyzed: de lta bu'i tshig la 'jug pa ni rdo rje dril bu ste /
translated: The entry into such words is the vajra bell,

original: dril bu ni stong pa nyid nye bar ston pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te de'i sgras smra ba'i @145b phyir ro //
analyzed: dril bu ni stong pa nyid nye bar ston pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te de'i sgras smra ba'i @145b phyir ro //
translated: because the bell is the perfection of wisdom, which teaches emptiness, and it is the bell of that.

original: tshogs gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ni sbyor ba ste /
analyzed: tshogs gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ni sbyor ba ste /
translated: The two accumulations, etc. The accumulation of merit and knowledge is the application.

original: rgyu des sems can kun gyi don dam pa rab tu ston pa tsam gyis ston pa'i snang ba med pa'i sems de'i rang bzhin gyi dri ma ni glo bur pa yin pas rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ste /
analyzed: rgyu des sems can kun gyi don dam pa rab tu ston pa tsam gyis ston pa'i snang ba med pa'i sems de'i rang bzhin gyi dri ma ni glo bur pa yin pas rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ste /
translated: By that cause, the nature of the mind, which is the appearance of the Teacher, is naturally luminous, since the stain of the ultimate truth taught to all sentient beings is adventitious, merely by the teaching.

original: de ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yin te lha rnams kyi gdan dang 'od do //
analyzed: de ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yin te lha rnams kyi gdan dang 'od do //
translated: That is the moon-disk, the seat and light of the deities.

original: phyag mtshan bcu drug gi de kho na nyid tshig rkang bcu drug gis ston pa ni /
analyzed: phyag mtshan bcu drug gi de kho na nyid tshig rkang bcu drug gis ston pa ni /
translated: The reality of the sixteen insignia is taught by sixteen verses.

original: shin tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: shin tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
translated: The reality of the vajra is stated by “very subtle,” etc.

original: yang dag par so sor rtog pa ni rdo rje'i de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: yang dag par so sor rtog pa ni rdo rje'i de kho na nyid do //
translated: Correct discrimination is the reality of the vajra.

original: 'dzin pa ni lcags kyu'o //
analyzed: 'dzin pa ni lcags kyu'o //
translated: Grasping is the hook.

original: phra bar 'bigs pa nyid ni mda'o //
analyzed: phra bar 'bigs pa nyid ni mda'o //
translated: The piercing of the subtle is the arrow.

original: dgyes pa ni legs so zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dgyes pa ni legs so zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The delight is the “excellent.”

original: zang zing gi spyin pas gdul bya rnams dbang du bya ba ni spros pa ste /
analyzed: zang zing gi spyin pas gdul bya rnams dbang du bya ba ni spros pa ste /
translated: The subjugation of the disciples by the gift of material things is the flower.🔽The satisfaction of the disciples by the gift of Dharma is the wheel.

original: de kho na nyid ni rin po che'i ste /
analyzed: de kho na nyid ni rin po che'i ste /
translated: The reality of the jewel is the reality of the jewel.

original: rtsa'i sgra ni tar ba stan pa yin no //
analyzed: rtsa'i sgra ni tar ba stan pa yin no //
translated: The word nadi is the reality of the sword.

original: gzi brjid ni nyi ma'i de nyin do //
analyzed: gzi brjid ni nyi ma'i de nyin do //
translated: The reality of the sun is the reality of the sun.

original: chos kyi tog bsgreng ba ni tog gi'o //
analyzed: chos kyi tog bsgreng ba ni tog gi'o //
translated: The reality of the raised crest is the reality of the crest.

original: sems rnam par 'byed pa ni bzhad pa'i'o //
analyzed: sems rnam par 'byed pa ni bzhad pa'i'o //
translated: The reality of the mind's differentiation is the reality of the smile.

original: theg pa chen po'i rnam par dag pa ni padma'i'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po'i rnam par dag pa ni padma'i'o //
translated: The reality of the purity of the Great Vehicle is the reality of the lotus.

original: nyon mongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i dgra bcom pa ni ral gri'i'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i dgra bcom pa ni ral gri'i'o //
translated: The reality of the conqueror of the enemies of afflictive conceptuality is the reality of the sword.

original: sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ni 'khor lo'i'o //
analyzed: sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ni 'khor lo'i'o //
translated: The reality of the mandala of bodhisattvas is the reality of the wheel.

original: de kho na nyid brjod pa ni smra ba'i'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid brjod pa ni smra ba'i'o //
translated: The reality of the expression of reality is the reality of the speech.

original: sna tshogs pa'i tshul nyid ni sna tshogs rdo rje'i'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i tshul nyid ni sna tshogs rdo rje'i'o //
translated: The reality of the various modes is the reality of the vajra cross.

original: gzhig par dka' ba ni go cha'i'o //
analyzed: gzhig par dka' ba ni go cha'i'o //
translated: The reality of difficulty to destroy is the reality of the armor.

original: 'jigs pa nyid ni mche ba'i'o //
analyzed: 'jigs pa nyid ni mche ba'i'o //
translated: The reality of fear is the reality of the fangs.

original: bcing ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi de kho na nyid yin no //
analyzed: bcing ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi de kho na nyid yin no //
translated: The reality of binding is the reality of the vajra fist.🔽Having thus stated the reality of the lords of the mandala,🔽in order to teach the reality of the ground mandala,

original: de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po rnams kyi de kho na nyid gsungs nas /
analyzed: de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po rnams kyi de kho na nyid gsungs nas /
translated: it is said:

original: gzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid ba stan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid ba stan pa'i phyir /
translated: The reality of the ground mandala is the reality of the ground mandala.

original: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The chapter called “The Mandala” and so forth.

original: gang bshad pa zhes bya ba ni gang du gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: gang bshad pa zhes bya ba ni gang du gsungs pa ste /
translated: “That which is explained” is that which is taught.

original: de kho na nyid ni yid kyi dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: de kho na nyid ni yid kyi dkyil 'khor te /
translated: The reality is the mental mandala.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi snying po ste gces pa gang yin pa de de'i len pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi snying po ste gces pa gang yin pa de de'i len pa'o //
translated: That which is the essence of extremely pure meditative concentration, which is cherished, is its “taking up.”

original: gdam pa yin pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus yang dag par bsdus pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gdam pa yin pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus yang dag par bsdus pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is “chosen” because it is included in the enjoyment body.

original: ye shes zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //
analyzed: ye shes zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //
translated: “Wisdom” is what is to be known.

original: khang pa ni sems te de'i brtsegs pa ni bsgreng ba'o //
analyzed: khang pa ni sems te de'i brtsegs pa ni bsgreng ba'o //
translated: The “house” is the mind, and its “summit” is its height.

original: phyi'i gnas gang yin par tshad kyis logs bzhi mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa gang yin pa de nyid ni thig bzhi zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: phyi'i gnas gang yin par tshad kyis logs bzhi mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa gang yin pa de nyid ni thig bzhi zhes bya ba la /
translated: The four “lines” are the four sides of the outer place, which are equal in measure.

original: de kho na nyid du ni byams pa @146a * //🔽la sogs pa yin te /
analyzed: de kho na nyid du ni byams pa @146a * // la sogs pa yin te /
translated: In reality, they are love and so forth.

original: byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms zhes bya ba ste /
translated: They are called love, compassion, joy, and equanimity.

original: tshad med pa bzhi po ni sems can tshad med pa la dmigs pa'i phyir byams pa la sogs pa la tshad med pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi po ni sems can tshad med pa la dmigs pa'i phyir byams pa la sogs pa la tshad med pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The four immeasurables are called immeasurables because they focus on immeasurables of sentient beings.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems can gyi dmigs pa ni tshangs pa'i gnas pa zhes bshad do //
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems can gyi dmigs pa ni tshangs pa'i gnas pa zhes bshad do //
translated: The object field of sentient beings in the desire realm is explained as the abode of Brahma.

original: chos rjes su dran pa'i de kho na nyid ni thig go //
analyzed: chos rjes su dran pa'i de kho na nyid ni thig go //
translated: The reality of the mindfulness of Dharma is the line.

original: lta ba kun las rnam par grol ba ni ye shes kyi thig go //
analyzed: lta ba kun las rnam par grol ba ni ye shes kyi thig go //
translated: Liberation from all views is the line of wisdom.

original: tshul khrims kyi tshogs ni rgyan gyi'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi tshogs ni rgyan gyi'o //
translated: The accumulation of ethics is the ornament.

original: dad pa la sogs pa dbang po lnga po ni ra ba lnga'i'o //🔽rnam par thar pa bzhi po ni sgo rnams kyi'o ;
analyzed: dad pa la sogs pa dbang po lnga po ni ra ba lnga'i'o // rnam par thar pa bzhi po ni sgo rnams kyi'o ;
translated: The five faculties of faith and so on are the five ramparts.🔽The four correct abandonments are the pediments and pillars.

original: / yang dag par spong ba bzhi po ni rta babs dang ka ba zung gi'o //
analyzed: / yang dag par spong ba bzhi po ni rta babs dang ka ba zung gi'o //
translated: The four bases of miraculous powers are the architraves.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po ni khyams rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po ni khyams rnams kyi'o //
translated: The four establishments of mindfulness are the terraces.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi po ni sgo khyud zung gi'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi po ni sgo khyud zung gi'o //
translated: The four legs of miraculous power are the pairs of doors.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun po ni phreng ba dang me tog gi chun 'phyang gi'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun po ni phreng ba dang me tog gi chun 'phyang gi'o //
translated: The seven factors of enlightenment are the garlands and flower canopies.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyang pa ni ka ba rnams kyi yin te /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyang pa ni ka ba rnams kyi yin te /
translated: The eightfold noble path is the pillars,

original: thams cad kyi nang du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad kyi nang du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the central support of all.

original: bsgom pa'i lam ni sgrib pa thams cad las nges par grol ba yin pas na de ni dkar po ste /
analyzed: bsgom pa'i lam ni sgrib pa thams cad las nges par grol ba yin pas na de ni dkar po ste /
translated: The path of cultivation is the white cloth, because it is completely liberated from all obscurations.

original: ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dag gis brtags shing yang dag par bsdus pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dag gis brtags shing yang dag par bsdus pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is investigated and well-collected by means of concentration and wisdom.

original: lam nyid ni ye shes te khyad par dang bcas shing phra ba dang bcas pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: lam nyid ni ye shes te khyad par dang bcas shing phra ba dang bcas pa'i phyir te /
translated: The path itself is the knowledge, because it is distinguished and subtle.

original: de kho na nyid de ni rnga yab kyi'o //🔽nyon mongs pa rnams kyi sa bon 'byin cing yang dag par gcod pa'i de kho na nyid de ni dra ba'i'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid de ni rnga yab kyi'o // nyon mongs pa rnams kyi sa bon 'byin cing yang dag par gcod pa'i de kho na nyid de ni dra ba'i'o //
translated: The reality of that is the yak-tail fan.🔽The reality of uprooting and completely severing the seeds of the afflictions is the net.

original: sa bon nye bar 'jig pa ni sel ba ste de kho na nyid de ni dra ba phyed pa'i'o //
analyzed: sa bon nye bar 'jig pa ni sel ba ste de kho na nyid de ni dra ba phyed pa'i'o //
translated: The reality of the complete destruction of the seeds is the half-net.

original: rnam par bsags shing tshogs nye bar bsags pa'i phyir yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams kyi zil gyis gnon par ma gyur cig snyam ste /
analyzed: rnam par bsags shing tshogs nye bar bsags pa'i phyir yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams kyi zil gyis gnon par ma gyur cig snyam ste /
translated: Because of the accumulation and collection of the accumulations, there is parinirvana, and because of the non-subjugation of the afflictions, there is no parinirvana.

original: sangs rgyas kyi spyan lnga po des nges par rtogs pa'i de kho na nyid kyi gnas lnga ni tshon rtsi lnga'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi spyan lnga po des nges par rtogs pa'i de kho na nyid kyi gnas lnga ni tshon rtsi lnga'o //
translated: The five colors are the five abodes of reality that are realized by the five buddha eyes.

original: me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga'i de kho na nyid ni sangs rgyas lnga'i'o //
analyzed: me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga'i de kho na nyid ni sangs rgyas lnga'i'o //
translated: The reality of the five wisdoms such as the mirror-like wisdom is that of the five buddhas.

original: byang chub kyi sems kyi de kho na nyid ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kyi de kho na nyid ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i'o //
translated: The reality of the mind of enlightenment is that of the lord of the mandala.

original: rdo rje 'dzin chen po'i dngos po de kho na nyid mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin chen po'i dngos po de kho na nyid mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
translated: The reality of the entity of the Great Vajradhara is non-abiding nirvana.

original: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag la mi gnas pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag la mi gnas pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because of not abiding in samsara and nirvana,

original: de la rim @146b pa bzhin du chags pa dang bral ba dang // chags pa dag gis te /
analyzed: de la rim @146b pa bzhin du chags pa dang bral ba dang // chags pa dag gis te /
translated: respectively, by being free from attachment and by being attached.

original: de la nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mchog rnam par dag pa'i mthar thug pa ni chags pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: de la nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mchog rnam par dag pa'i mthar thug pa ni chags pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: The supreme intuition of all dharmas equal to space, which is the ultimate purity, is free from attachment.
