original: chags pa ni lha la sogs pa'i rnam bar nye bar zhen pa'i sems ni chags pa'o //
analyzed: chags pa ni lha la sogs pa'i rnam bar nye bar zhen pa'i sems ni chags pa'o //
translated: Attachment is the mind attached to the form of a deity, etc.

original: chags pa dang dang bral bar gyur nas chags pa ga las byung zhe na /🔽ye shes de yi rgyan bshad pa //
analyzed: chags pa dang dang bral bar gyur nas chags pa ga las byung zhe na / ye shes de yi rgyan bshad pa //
translated: Having become free from attachment, where does attachment come from?

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The ornament of that intuition is explained.

original: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ye shes de nyid kyis tshogs bsags pa'i stobs kyis lhun gyis grub pa'i zhen pa'i sems su byed pa ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ye shes de nyid kyis tshogs bsags pa'i stobs kyis lhun gyis grub pa'i zhen pa'i sems su byed pa ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra'o //
translated: By the power of accumulating the collections with that very intuition equal to space, the mind of attachment is spontaneously accomplished, like a wish-fulfilling gem.

original: de yang ci zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: de yang ci zhig yin zhe na /
translated: Moreover, what is that?

original: chags bral las zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: chags bral las zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is said, “from freedom from attachment,” etc.

original: gzhan yin no zhes bya ba ni chags pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan yin no zhes bya ba ni chags pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “Other” means the meaning of “attachment.”

original: de la chags pa dang bral bas byang chub pa ni chos kyi sku'o //
analyzed: de la chags pa dang bral bas byang chub pa ni chos kyi sku'o //
translated: There, the enlightenment free from attachment is the Dharma Body.

original: chags pas zhes pa'i sems ni longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: chags pas zhes pa'i sems ni longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku'o //
translated: The mind of attachment is the Enjoyment and Transformation Bodies.

original: de bas na gnyis ka byang chub kyi sems yin te byang chub dang sems zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de bas na gnyis ka byang chub kyi sems yin te byang chub dang sems zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, both are the Thought of Enlightenment, because of the words enlightenment and mind.

original: chags bral las chags ba zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid dang mtshan nyid can gyi dbye bas lnga pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid can ni byang chub bo //
analyzed: chags bral las chags ba zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid dang mtshan nyid can gyi dbye bas lnga pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid can ni byang chub bo //
translated: The mind of attachment is the mind of detachment, because of the division into characteristic and that characterized. The fifth, the characteristic of detachment, is enlightenment.

original: chags pa'i mtshan nyid ni sems zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: chags pa'i mtshan nyid ni sems zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The characteristic of attachment is the mind.

original: 'di yang zhen pa'i sems la sems kyi sgrar bshad do //
analyzed: 'di yang zhen pa'i sems la sems kyi sgrar bshad do //
translated: This also is explained as the word mind in the case of the attached mind.

original: thun mong gi sgra yin yang la la khyad bar du ba stan pa'am /
analyzed: thun mong gi sgra yin yang la la khyad bar du ba stan pa'am /
translated: Even though the word is common, it is applied to a particular case, or

original: snga ma'i tshig mi mngon par byas pa'o //
analyzed: snga ma'i tshig mi mngon par byas pa'o //
translated: the former word is made invisible.

original: byang chub 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems yin na 'dod chags zhes gang las bshad ce na /
analyzed: byang chub 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems yin na 'dod chags zhes gang las bshad ce na /
translated: If enlightenment is the mind of detachment, from what is it said that the mind is attachment?

original: gang gi phyir 'jig rten zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'jig rten zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to explain this, he says, “Because of the world, etc.

original: 'jig rten ni 'khor bar yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten ni 'khor bar yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa ste /
translated: The world is a thoroughly imagined non-reality in cyclic existence.🔽Because it is said:

original: yang dag ma yin kun rtog ni //
analyzed: yang dag ma yin kun rtog ni //
translated: The imagination of what is unreal

original: sems dang sems byung khams gsum pa //🔽zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems dang sems byung khams gsum pa // zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is mind and mental functions in the three realms.

original: de yang gang gi phyir chags pa dang bral bas 'dul zhing bsal ba'i 'jig rten gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de yang gang gi phyir chags pa dang bral bas 'dul zhing bsal ba'i 'jig rten gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: And that is so called because it is a world that is disciplined and purified by freedom from attachment.

original: lha'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rnam pa lta bu ni phyag rgya ste de'i dngos grub ni rnam pa des rnal 'byor pa rdzogs pa ste /
analyzed: lha'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rnam pa lta bu ni phyag rgya ste de'i dngos grub ni rnam pa des rnal 'byor pa rdzogs pa ste /
translated: The seal is like the form, speech, and mind of a deity, and its success is the completion of the yogin by that form.

original: de yang chags pa las byung ba yin no //
analyzed: de yang chags pa las byung ba yin no //
translated: And that is born of attachment.

original: der ni zhes bya ba ni chags pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: der ni zhes bya ba ni chags pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: There, in the absence of attachment,

original: thabs ni sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: thabs ni sgrub pa'o //
translated: the means is the practice.

original: bsgom pa ni de nyid du yun ring zhing @147a * //
analyzed: bsgom pa ni de nyid du yun ring zhing @147a * //
translated: Cultivation is the long-term,

original: gus pas rgyun mi 'chad par yid la byed cing bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: gus pas rgyun mi 'chad par yid la byed cing bsgom pa'o //
translated: respectful, uninterrupted mental attention and practice of that.

original: de la man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su bskyed la /
analyzed: de la man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su bskyed la /
translated: There, one should generate the imagination in accordance with the instructions.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs sems tsam du yid la byed pa ni chags pa'i bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs sems tsam du yid la byed pa ni chags pa'i bsgom pa'o //
translated: The meditation of attachment is the mental attention to the body, speech, and mind as mere mind.

original: ci lta ba'i rnam pa med pas nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'i tshul gyis yid la byed pa ni 'dod chags dang bral bar bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: ci lta ba'i rnam pa med pas nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'i tshul gyis yid la byed pa ni 'dod chags dang bral bar bsgom pa'o //
translated: The meditation of non-attachment is the mental attention to the mode of space, since it is devoid of the aspect of the way things really are.

original: dngos grub thams cad ni sku gsum grub pa'o //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad ni sku gsum grub pa'o //
translated: All powers are the powers of the three bodies.

original: bsgom pa gnyis ka la nges par spyar ba'i phyir ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: bsgom pa gnyis ka la nges par spyar ba'i phyir ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to definitely apply both meditations, he says, “just as,” etc.

original: ji ltar 'khrul pa'i mtshan nyid 'jig rten pa'i gsal pa de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba bsgom pa yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar 'khrul pa'i mtshan nyid 'jig rten pa'i gsal pa de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba bsgom pa yin te /
translated: The clarity of the world, which has the characteristic of error, is the meditation of non-attachment.

original: 'dod chags kyi bsgom pa la yang de bzhin du spyad par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dod chags kyi bsgom pa la yang de bzhin du spyad par bya ste /
translated: The meditation of attachment should be practiced in the same way.

original: 'ba' zhig pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'ba' zhig pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not just the only one.

original: yang rnal 'byor pas 'dod chags dang bral ba'i bsgom pas gdul bya rnams gdul bar mi nus pa la bslab pa'i lhag par mos pa'i dbang du mdzad nas zhes bya ba de'i sbyor ba gang yin zhe na /🔽ji ltar gdul bya dag gyur pa //
analyzed: yang rnal 'byor pas 'dod chags dang bral ba'i bsgom pas gdul bya rnams gdul bar mi nus pa la bslab pa'i lhag par mos pa'i dbang du mdzad nas zhes bya ba de'i sbyor ba gang yin zhe na / ji ltar gdul bya dag gyur pa //
translated: Moreover, with respect to those disciples who are unable to be guided by the yogi’s meditation free from attachment, the application of that is as follows.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: As it is said:

original: ji ltar gyi sgra ni nges par ba stan pa'i don te /
analyzed: ji ltar gyi sgra ni nges par ba stan pa'i don te /
translated: The sound “as” has the meaning of “only.”🔽Thus, “only the pure mind is the deity” is the application of that meditation of attachment only.

original: 'di ltar dag pa 'ba' zhig sems tsam lha yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni chags pa'i bsgom pa 'ba' zhig pa ste de'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'di ltar dag pa 'ba' zhig sems tsam lha yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni chags pa'i bsgom pa 'ba' zhig pa ste de'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: And that is also said:

original: de yang / de yi gzung min de yi 'dzin pa min //
analyzed: de yang / de yi gzung min de yi 'dzin pa min //
translated: It is not the object, it is not the subject,

original: ye shes gzhan 'dzin de yang stong pa yin //
analyzed: ye shes gzhan 'dzin de yang stong pa yin //
translated: The other wisdom that apprehends that is also empty.

original: de lta min yang ye shes rang bzhin snang //
analyzed: de lta min yang ye shes rang bzhin snang //
translated: Even if it is not so, the nature of wisdom appears.

original: mngon sum dag ni rdo rje 'chang ba'i bde //🔽zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum dag ni rdo rje 'chang ba'i bde //🔽zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The bliss of Vajradhara is direct perception.

original: gang yang pha rol nyid kyis 'dzin par byed pa nyid dang / gzung bar bya ba nyid du bsgom pa de ni de las phyag rgya'i dngos grub mi 'byung ste /
analyzed: gang yang pha rol nyid kyis 'dzin par byed pa nyid dang / gzung bar bya ba nyid du bsgom pa de ni de las phyag rgya'i dngos grub mi 'byung ste /
translated: But if one cultivates the seal as the object of the other's grasping, and as the object of one's own grasping, then the power of the seal will not arise from that.

original: zhen pas chags pa sgom par byed pa ni kun du  mchod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhen pas chags pa sgom par byed pa ni kun du  mchod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Cultivating attachment through attachment is a complete worship.

original: chags pa dang bral ba'i bsgom pas bden pa dang bden pa ma yin pa bsngags so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: chags pa dang bral ba'i bsgom pas bden pa dang bden pa ma yin pa bsngags so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Cultivating non-attachment through non-attachment is a true worship.

original: kun du  mchod par 'gyur zhes bya ba mi rigs te /
analyzed: kun du  mchod par 'gyur zhes bya ba mi rigs te /
translated: It is not reasonable to say a complete worship.

original: chags pa bsgom pa 'ba' zhig gis chos kyi sku 'thob par mi 'gyur la longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa'i sku yang de la brten pa yin pas re zhig de yang 'thob par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chags pa bsgom pa 'ba' zhig gis chos kyi sku 'thob par mi 'gyur la longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa'i sku yang de la brten pa yin pas re zhig de yang 'thob par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: One does not attain the Dharma Body by cultivating attachment alone, and since the Enjoyment Body and the Transformation Body are based on that, one does not attain them for a while.

original: 'dir brjod par bya ste sku gsum gyi mtshan nyid 'di ni sangs rgyas nyid dang byang chub sems dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa de ni @147b 'byung bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: 'dir brjod par bya ste sku gsum gyi mtshan nyid 'di ni sangs rgyas nyid dang byang chub sems dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa de ni @147b 'byung bar 'gyur la /
translated: Here it should be said: This characteristic of the three bodies is the perfection of the Buddha and the Bodhisattva.

original: de'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas nyid du yang phyir 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas nyid du yang phyir 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: By the power of that, one will also become a buddha.

original: gzhan yang mtshan nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: gzhan yang mtshan nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Moreover, in the verse that begins with “character,” etc.

original: mtshan nyid ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa gang yang dag par bshad pa ste /
analyzed: mtshan nyid ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa gang yang dag par bshad pa ste /
translated: The character is the great seal, etc., which is explained correctly.

original: bshad pa des mtshan nyid mtshon par 'gyur te mtshan nyid dang mtshan gzhi zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bshad pa des mtshan nyid mtshon par 'gyur te mtshan nyid dang mtshan gzhi zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: By that explanation, the character is indicated, the meaning of which is “character and characterized.”

original: de nas ci zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: de nas ci zhig yin zhe na /
translated: Then, what is it?

original: phyag rgya yis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: phyag rgya yis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is said, “by the seal,” etc.

original: gal te phyag rgya zhes bsgoms na de'i cho rnal 'byor pa sbyor ba rdzogs pa na phyag rgya dang gcig tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te phyag rgya zhes bsgoms na de'i cho rnal 'byor pa sbyor ba rdzogs pa na phyag rgya dang gcig tu 'gyur ro //
translated: If one meditates on the seal, then the yogi/nī, when the practice is complete, will become one with the seal.

original: rgyas btab pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bdag nyid can du gang gi tshe rgyas btab pa ni nye bar mtshon pa'i dngos po lha la sogs pa'i rnam par shes par bya zhing bdag nyid mos par byas la bsgoms na /
analyzed: rgyas btab pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bdag nyid can du gang gi tshe rgyas btab pa ni nye bar mtshon pa'i dngos po lha la sogs pa'i rnam par shes par bya zhing bdag nyid mos par byas la bsgoms na /
translated: When the seal is impressed, the object that is impressed should be known as the form of the deity, etc., and one should meditate on oneself as being devoted to that.

original: de'i tshe rgyas btab par 'gyur zhing rgyas btab pa ni lha'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe rgyas btab par 'gyur zhing rgyas btab pa ni lha'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur ro //
translated: At that time, one is sealed, and the sealing becomes the nature of the deity.

original: de bas na byang chub kyi sems kyi bdag nyid can rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya de bzhin du shes shing bsgoms na rnal 'byor pa rdo rje sems dpa'i sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bas na byang chub kyi sems kyi bdag nyid can rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya de bzhin du shes shing bsgoms na rnal 'byor pa rdo rje sems dpa'i sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid can du 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, if one knows and meditates on the seal of Vajrasattva, which is the nature of the Thought of Enlightenment, the yogi becomes the nature of the body, speech, and mind of Vajrasattva.

original: gang de ltar skad cig ma re re zhing byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pas chags pa dang bral ba la rab tu zhen par bya'i /
analyzed: gang de ltar skad cig ma re re zhing byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pas chags pa dang bral ba la rab tu zhen par bya'i /
translated: Thus, one should be attached to the freedom from passion by meditating on the Thought of Enlightenment in every moment,

original: chags pa 'ba' zhig gis ni ma yin te /
analyzed: chags pa 'ba' zhig gis ni ma yin te /
translated: but not by passion alone.

original: de bas na mtshan dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de bas na mtshan dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “the signs, etc.”

original: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang mtshan gzhis 'brel pa phye nas mtshan nyid snang bzhin pas mtshan gzhi gzugs nyid shes nas rnal 'byor gyi rtsom pa rnams la mos pa brtan pos kun du  spyod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang mtshan gzhis 'brel pa phye nas mtshan nyid snang bzhin pas mtshan gzhi gzugs nyid shes nas rnal 'byor gyi rtsom pa rnams la mos pa brtan pos kun du  spyod pa yin gyi /
translated: Having distinguished the connection between the characteristic and the characterized, such as Akṣhobhya, etc., by the appearance of the characteristic, one should understand the characterized, such as form, etc., and one should practice with firm devotion in the compositions of yoga.

original: chags pa'i sgom pa 'ba' zhig ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chags pa'i sgom pa 'ba' zhig ni ma yin no //
translated: This is not just meditation on attachment.

original: des cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: des cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What is the result of that?

original: ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is said, “just as, etc.”

original: ji ltar mtshan nyid kyis yang dag par grub pa yongs su rdzogs pa mtshan gzhi yang de bzhin du dngos po dag par 'gyur te /
analyzed: ji ltar mtshan nyid kyis yang dag par grub pa yongs su rdzogs pa mtshan gzhi yang de bzhin du dngos po dag par 'gyur te /
translated: Just as the characterized is completely perfected by the characteristic, so too the entities will be purified.

original: sgrib pa zad pa thob pas myur zhing mgyogs par rdo rje 'chang ba'i sku gsum gyi bdag nyid can du 'grub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: sgrib pa zad pa thob pas myur zhing mgyogs par rdo rje 'chang ba'i sku gsum gyi bdag nyid can du 'grub par 'gyur te /
translated: By attaining the exhaustion of obscurations, one will quickly and swiftly accomplish the state of Vajradhara, which is the nature of the three kāyas.

original: de bas na /🔽zhen pa kun du  mchod par 'gyur //
analyzed: de bas na / zhen pa kun du  mchod par 'gyur //
translated: Therefore,🔽it is said, “all attachments will be completely offered.”

original: zhes bya ba ni legs par gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni legs par gsungs pa yin no //
translated: This is well-spoken.

original: mtshan nyid dang mtshan ma dang phyag rgya dang ming dang brda zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs yin no //
analyzed: mtshan nyid dang mtshan ma dang phyag rgya dang ming dang brda zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs yin no //
translated: The terms definition, sign, seal, name, and symbol are synonyms.

original: de bas na mtshan nyid kyi skabs su brda gzhan dag gi yang @148a * //🔽don bshad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de bas na mtshan nyid kyi skabs su brda gzhan dag gi yang @148a * // don bshad pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, in the context of the definition, the other symbols are also explained.

original: g-yas pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: g-yas pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: For the sake of explaining the meaning of the others, he says the right hand, etc.

original: rmi lam la sogs pa'i srid pas zhugs pa'i lha la sogs pa'i phyag g-yas pa'i mtshan ma'i don ni shes rab bo //
analyzed: rmi lam la sogs pa'i srid pas zhugs pa'i lha la sogs pa'i phyag g-yas pa'i mtshan ma'i don ni shes rab bo //
translated: The meaning of the sign in the right hand of the gods, etc., who have entered existence through dreams, etc., is wisdom.

original: phyag g-yon pa'i mtshan ma'i don ni thugs rje'o //
analyzed: phyag g-yon pa'i mtshan ma'i don ni thugs rje'o //
translated: The meaning of the sign in the left hand is compassion.

original: phyag gnyis ka'i mtshan ma ni ting nge 'dzin gnyis so //
analyzed: phyag gnyis ka'i mtshan ma ni ting nge 'dzin gnyis so //
translated: The sign of both hands is the two meditative stabilizations.

original: rkang pa gnyis kyi mtshan ma ni tshogs gnyis so //
analyzed: rkang pa gnyis kyi mtshan ma ni tshogs gnyis so //
translated: The sign of both feet is the two collections.

original: sor mo lnga la sogs pa'i sbyor ba ni sangs rgyas lngar mngon par byang chub pa'i lha nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
analyzed: sor mo lnga la sogs pa'i sbyor ba ni sangs rgyas lngar mngon par byang chub pa'i lha nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
translated: The application of the five fingers, etc., is the twenty-five deities of manifest enlightenment as the five buddhas.

original: sor mo re res ni nam mkha' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: sor mo re res ni nam mkha' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Each finger is the maṇḍala of space, etc.

original: lte ba la sogs par reg pa ni lha mo lnga ste /
analyzed: lte ba la sogs par reg pa ni lha mo lnga ste /
translated: The five goddesses are touched at the navel, etc.

original: 'di dag ni lus kyi brda'o //
analyzed: 'di dag ni lus kyi brda'o //
translated: These are the bodily signs.

original: gsung gi brda ba stan pa ni byang chub lngar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: gsung gi brda ba stan pa ni byang chub lngar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
translated: The verbal signs are stated by “the five awakenings,” etc.

original: sangs rgyas lnga mngon par byang chub pa'i sgra ni ye shes lnga'am de'i dkyil 'khor gyi don to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas lnga mngon par byang chub pa'i sgra ni ye shes lnga'am de'i dkyil 'khor gyi don to //
translated: The sound of the five buddhas’ awakening is the meaning of the five intuitions or their mandala.

original: sngon gyi sgra ni snga ma'o //
analyzed: sngon gyi sgra ni snga ma'o //
translated: The sound “before” is the former.

original: rgyab kyi sgra ni phyi nas so //
analyzed: rgyab kyi sgra ni phyi nas so //
translated: The sound “behind” is the latter.

original: thog ma'i sgra ni rgyu'i don to //
analyzed: thog ma'i sgra ni rgyu'i don to //
translated: The sound “first” is the meaning of cause.

original: tha ma'i sgra ni 'bras bu'i don to //
analyzed: tha ma'i sgra ni 'bras bu'i don to //
translated: The sound “last” is the meaning of effect.

original: de la rgyu ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
analyzed: de la rgyu ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
translated: Therein, the cause is the bodhisattvas.

original: 'bras bu ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'o //🔽'o na rnam par snang mdzad ci rgyu yin nam /
analyzed: 'bras bu ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'o // 'o na rnam par snang mdzad ci rgyu yin nam /
translated: The effect is Akshobhya, etc.

original: 'on te 'bras bu yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te 'bras bu yin zhe na /
translated: Well then, is Vairochana the cause or the effect?🔽He states “the buddhas,” etc.

original: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te de ni go sla'o ;
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te de ni go sla'o ;
translated: This is easy to understand.

original: / de lta na sangs rgyas ni gang zhig yin /
analyzed: / de lta na sangs rgyas ni gang zhig yin /
translated: In that case, what is the buddha?

original: rtogs par bya ba ni gang zhig yin /
analyzed: rtogs par bya ba ni gang zhig yin /
translated: What is the realization?

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni gang zhig yin //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni gang zhig yin //
translated: What is a buddhafield?

original: byang chub kyi sems ni gang zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems ni gang zhig yin zhe na /
translated: What is the thought of awakening?

original: de'i phyir rang gi sems zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rang gi sems zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, he says, “one’s own mind,” and so on.

original: rang gi sems nyid sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang byang chub kyi sems kyang yin no zhes bya bar spyar bar bya ste lhag ma ni go sla'o //
analyzed: rang gi sems nyid sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang byang chub kyi sems kyang yin no zhes bya bar spyar bar bya ste lhag ma ni go sla'o //
translated: One’s own mind is a buddhafield and the thought of awakening. The rest is easy to understand.

original: dris pa sems ni thog ma med pa yin la /
analyzed: dris pa sems ni thog ma med pa yin la /
translated: The question is asked: the mind is beginningless,

original: byang chub pa ni thog ma dang ldan pa yin na /
analyzed: byang chub pa ni thog ma dang ldan pa yin na /
translated: and awakening is endowed with a beginning.

original: ci'i phyir sems de nyid byang chub kyi sems yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir sems de nyid byang chub kyi sems yin zhe na /
translated: Why is that very mind the thought of awakening?

original: de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, he says, “nature,” and so on.

original: rang bzhin ni sems kyi chos nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin ni sems kyi chos nyid do //
translated: Nature is the reality of the mind.

original: des 'od gsal ba'i dri ma med pa ni sems can rnams so //
analyzed: des 'od gsal ba'i dri ma med pa ni sems can rnams so //
translated: By that, the stainless clarity is sentient beings.

original: kun du  zhes bya ba'i gnas skabs thams cad du'o //
analyzed: kun du  zhes bya ba'i gnas skabs thams cad du'o //
translated: Everywhere means in all circumstances.

original: de ltar yang dag par dran pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te /
analyzed: de ltar yang dag par dran pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te /
translated: Thus, the Blessed One has said that mindfulness is correct.

original: ci'i phyir de 'od gsal ba yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir de 'od gsal ba yin nam zhe na /
translated: Why is it luminous?

original: dri ma lhag ma rnams ni de'i glo @148b bur ba yin te /
analyzed: dri ma lhag ma rnams ni de'i glo @148b bur ba yin te /
translated: The remaining stains are adventitious to it.

original: nam mkha' la sprin dang du ba la sogs pa dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' la sprin dang du ba la sogs pa dang 'dra'o //
translated: They are like clouds and smoke, etc. in the sky.

original: de bas na glo bur ba'i sgrib pa'i dri ma gang dang gang yin pa zad cing yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid can ni thog ma'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: de bas na glo bur ba'i sgrib pa'i dri ma gang dang gang yin pa zad cing yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid can ni thog ma'i byang chub bo //
translated: Therefore, whatever the adventitious stains of obscuration, they are exhausted in it. Its characteristic is reality.

original: rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i mtshan nyid kyang byang chub yin te thog ma med pa'i rang bzhin dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i mtshan nyid kyang byang chub yin te thog ma med pa'i rang bzhin dang 'dra'o //
translated: Enlightenment is also the characteristic of natural purity, like the nature of beginninglessness.

original: de bas na byang chub ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa yin la /
analyzed: de bas na byang chub ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, enlightenment is without beginning or end.

original: sangs rgyas kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa yin la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa yin la /
translated: And buddhahood is also without beginning or end.

original: byang chub kyi sems kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa yin te /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa yin te /
translated: And the thought of enlightenment is also without beginning or end.

original: byang chub kyang yin la sems kyang yin pas de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyang yin la sems kyang yin pas de skad ces bya'o //
translated: It is called that because it is both enlightenment and thought.

original: dang po ni bcom ldan 'das dpal mchog dang po ste /
analyzed: dang po ni bcom ldan 'das dpal mchog dang po ste /
translated: The first is the Blessed One, the Primordial Splendor.

original: 'di ni snying gar rde bas pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ni snying gar rde bas pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: This is called “the stone in the heart. ”

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rang nyid brtan par gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang nyid brtan par gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because one becomes firm oneself.

original: 'od dpag tu med pa ni skra 'dzin par bshad de /
analyzed: 'od dpag tu med pa ni skra 'dzin par bshad de /
translated: Amitābha is explained as the hair-holder,

original: gang gi phyir ral pa'i dbus na bzhugs pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir ral pa'i dbus na bzhugs pa yin no //
translated: because he resides in the middle of the topknot.

original: 'o byed pa ni rdo rje smra ba'o zhes bya ba ni gsal ba nyid do //
analyzed: 'o byed pa ni rdo rje smra ba'o zhes bya ba ni gsal ba nyid do //
translated: The kissing is Vajra Speech, which is clear.

original: mnyam sbyor ba ni rnam par snang mdzad yin pa ni gzhi gnyis su med pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mnyam sbyor ba ni rnam par snang mdzad yin pa ni gzhi gnyis su med pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The union is Vairocana, because of the non-duality of the two bases.

original: don gyi char ni don gyi rab tu dbye ba'o //
analyzed: don gyi char ni don gyi rab tu dbye ba'o //
translated: The division of the meaning is the division of the object.

original: bu mo'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams so //
analyzed: bu mo'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams so //
translated: The meaning of the girl is the perfections.

original: gzhan du mi rtag ces bya ba ni phyi rol gyi bud med ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan du mi rtag ces bya ba ni phyi rol gyi bud med ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the other is not impermanent, meaning that it is not an external woman.

original: bud med kyi sgra'i don ni gang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: bud med kyi sgra'i don ni gang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsgom pa'o //
translated: The meaning of the word woman is that which is cultivated by the bodhisattvas.

original: lha mo'i zhes bya ba'i sgra'i don ni mchod pa'i lha mo mi bskyod pa la sogs pa nyi shu'o //
analyzed: lha mo'i zhes bya ba'i sgra'i don ni mchod pa'i lha mo mi bskyod pa la sogs pa nyi shu'o //
translated: The meaning of the term “goddess” is the twenty goddesses of offering, Akṣobhya, etc.

original: rang gi chung ma dang rang gi rig pa'i don ni rang gi rigs kyi rig ma'o //
analyzed: rang gi chung ma dang rang gi rig pa'i don ni rang gi rigs kyi rig ma'o //
translated: The meaning of “one’s wife” and “one’s knowledge” is one’s knowledge consort of one’s own clan.

original: gzhan gyi chung ma dang gzhan gyi sdug pa'i sgra ni rigs gzhan gyi rig ma rnams so //
analyzed: gzhan gyi chung ma dang gzhan gyi sdug pa'i sgra ni rigs gzhan gyi rig ma rnams so //
translated: The meaning of “another’s wife” and “another’s beloved” is the knowledge consorts of other clans.

original: gci ba dang sgra'i don ni rdo rje ye shes so //
analyzed: gci ba dang sgra'i don ni rdo rje ye shes so //
translated: The meaning of “feces” and “sound” is the vajra-knowledge.

original: bshad ba dang padma'i sgra ni chos kyi ye shes sgrib pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: bshad ba dang padma'i sgra ni chos kyi ye shes sgrib pa med pa yin no //
translated: The meaning of “speech” and “lotus” is the unobstructed Dharma-knowledge.

original: rang gi rdo rje zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad du gyur pa'i bdag nyid kyi rdo rje dang de'i rig pa'i padma ste /
analyzed: rang gi rdo rje zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad du gyur pa'i bdag nyid kyi rdo rje dang de'i rig pa'i padma ste /
translated: One’s own vajra is the vajra of one’s own nature, which is Vairocana, and the lotus of one’s knowledge,

original: rang gi sa bon ni de nyid kyi ye shes kyi khu ba'o //
analyzed: rang gi sa bon ni de nyid kyi ye shes kyi khu ba'o //
translated: one’s own seed is the essence of the knowledge of that very [vajra].

original: mchod par bya zhes bya ba ni bskyed par bya ba'o //
analyzed: mchod par bya zhes bya ba ni bskyed par bya ba'o //
translated: One should worship means one should generate.

original: ji ltar bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar bya zhe na /
translated: How should one do it?

original: tshogs gnyis kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: tshogs gnyis kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is said, “with the two accumulations,” etc.

original: gnyis min gnyis nyid ces bya ba ni de ltar gnyis su med par gyur pa las /
analyzed: gnyis min gnyis nyid ces bya ba ni de ltar gnyis su med par gyur pa las /
translated: The “non-dual duality” is that, having become non-dual in that way,

original: gnyis nyid la brten te thugs rjes gzhan rnams go bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyis nyid la brten te thugs rjes gzhan rnams go bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: it is a duality in dependence on compassion in order to make others understand.

original: phyis @149a * //🔽ni mnyam sbyor ba zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: phyis @149a * // ni mnyam sbyor ba zhes bya ba ste /
translated: “Later” means

original: yang gnyis su med par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: yang gnyis su med par gyur pa'o //
translated: after the non-dual union.

original: byin gyis brlab ces bya ba ni ye shes kyi khu ba de nyid las de bskyed par bya ba ste 'di ni dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: byin gyis brlab ces bya ba ni ye shes kyi khu ba de nyid las de bskyed par bya ba ste 'di ni dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'o //
translated: “Empowerment” means that, from that very seminal essence of pristine awareness, it is generated. This is the accomplishment of the maṇḍala.

original: sangs rgyas kyi rol mo ni rdo rje gar ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi rol mo ni rdo rje gar ro //
translated: “Buddha’s play” is the vajra dance.

original: mnyam sbyor bas zhes bya ba ni bsgom bzhin pas so //
analyzed: mnyam sbyor bas zhes bya ba ni bsgom bzhin pas so //
translated: “Through union” means through meditation.

original: rgyu dang mi rgyu rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor pa rnams dang bcas pas sam /
analyzed: rgyu dang mi rgyu rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor pa rnams dang bcas pas sam /
translated: “All moving and unmoving” means together with the maṇḍala or

original: sems can thams cad rang gi lha'i gzugs su lhag par mos pas so //
analyzed: sems can thams cad rang gi lha'i gzugs su lhag par mos pas so //
translated: through the imagination that all sentient beings are the form of one’s deity.

original: rol pa zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor gyi rang bzhin gyis byur bas so //
analyzed: rol pa zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor gyi rang bzhin gyis byur bas so //
translated: “Play” means through the nature of yoga.

original: sku gsung thugs ni bsgoms pas so zhes bya ba ni rang gi lha'i sbyor bas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs ni bsgoms pas so zhes bya ba ni rang gi lha'i sbyor bas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: By meditating on body, speech, and mind means by the yoga of one's deity.

original: rta babs dang ka ba brgyang kyis nye bar mdzes par bya ba'i nang gi ka ba brgyang kyi mdun gyi gnas rnams su dkyil 'khor brgyang bya bar ba stan la /
analyzed: rta babs dang ka ba brgyang kyis nye bar mdzes par bya ba'i nang gi ka ba brgyang kyi mdun gyi gnas rnams su dkyil 'khor brgyang bya bar ba stan la /
translated: Inside the temple, which is beautified by archways and pillars, one should visualize the mandalas in front of the pillars.

original: rdo rje lha mo ni rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyang da de rnams kyi tshogs kyis mchod pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje lha mo ni rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyang da de rnams kyi tshogs kyis mchod pa'o //
translated: The vajra goddesses are the vajra-grace, etc.

original: lha'i snam bu mtshams kyi re'u cha dor la /
analyzed: lha'i snam bu mtshams kyi re'u cha dor la /
translated: One should omit the squares in the corners of the celestial palace.🔽In each of the remaining five squares, one should visualize the five mandalas of the Tathagatas, each with five deities,

original: lnga po re char rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor lnga 'di rnams lha re re zhing lha lnga lnga yod par bya ba dang / dra ba dang rnga yab la sogs pas brgyan pa dang / khyams kyi nang du ni lha nyi shu rtsa lnga dang ldan par ci rigs par byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
analyzed: lnga po re char rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor lnga 'di rnams lha re re zhing lha lnga lnga yod par bya ba dang / dra ba dang rnga yab la sogs pas brgyan pa dang / khyams kyi nang du ni lha nyi shu rtsa lnga dang ldan par ci rigs par byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
translated: adorned with nets, yak-tail fans, etc., and in the inner courtyard, one should bless the twenty-five deities as appropriate.

original: dbus ma'i cha zhes bya ba la ji ltar dbus ma'i cha yin zhe na /
analyzed: dbus ma'i cha zhes bya ba la ji ltar dbus ma'i cha yin zhe na /
translated: The middle part means: how is it the middle part?

original: cha dgu ru ni rnam dbye ba //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: cha dgu ru ni rnam dbye ba // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is divided into nine parts.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi ngos re re zhing cha dgur bgos la tshangs pa'i thig gi ngos gnyis su re re zhing phyed dang lnga'i char bu'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi ngos re re zhing cha dgur bgos la tshangs pa'i thig gi ngos gnyis su re re zhing phyed dang lnga'i char bu'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that each side of the mandala is divided into nine parts, and on both sides of the Brahma line, each is divided into five and a half parts.

original: de zhes bya ba ni sgor ro //🔽sgo'i tshad ji tsam pa sgo khyud dang lha'i snam bu'i tshad kyang de tsam yin no //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni sgor ro // sgo'i tshad ji tsam pa sgo khyud dang lha'i snam bu'i tshad kyang de tsam yin no //
translated: That means the gate.🔽The size of the gate is the same as the size of the gate enclosure and the god platform.

original: sgro'i phyed kyi tshad ni thams cad du khyams sgo 'gram du de bzhin du sgo'i logs kyi yin no //
analyzed: sgro'i phyed kyi tshad ni thams cad du khyams sgo 'gram du de bzhin du sgo'i logs kyi yin no //
translated: The size of half the gate is everywhere, like the gate enclosure.

original: nang gi dkyil gi dkyil 'khor ni nang gi rim pa ste /
analyzed: nang gi dkyil gi dkyil 'khor ni nang gi rim pa ste /
translated: The inner mandala is the inner circle.

original: de dang mnyam zhes bya ba ni phyi'i rim pa dang mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: de dang mnyam zhes bya ba ni phyi'i rim pa dang mnyam pa'o //
translated: Equal to that means equal to the outer circle.

original: yongs su ma chad pa ni tshad mtha' yas pa nyid do //
analyzed: yongs su ma chad pa ni tshad mtha' yas pa nyid do //
translated: Unlimited means limitless size.

original: de skad du //
analyzed: de skad du //
translated: Thus it is said:

original: de kun rta babs med pa'o //
analyzed: de kun rta babs med pa'o //
translated: All of that is without gateways.

original: zhes bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes bshad pa yin te /
translated: This is explained.

original: rta babs med pa ni rta babs dang ka ba la sogs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rta babs med pa ni rta babs dang ka ba la sogs pa med pa'o //
translated: Without gateways means without gateways, pillars, and so forth.

original: tshad gsungs pa ni sgo khyud ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: tshad gsungs pa ni sgo khyud ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
translated: The measure is stated in the statement “the courtyard and so forth.”🔽The courtyard and the entire mandala, and so forth, refers to the door, the door area, the wall, and the roof, which are made half the size in relation to the outer perimeter.🔽That which is called “the courtyard and the mandala half” is divided into nine parts.

original: sgo khyud dang dkyil 'khor kun dang / sogs @149b pa'i sgras sgo dang sgo 'gram dang logs dang ya phugs ni phyi'i rim pa la ltos nas phyed kyi tshad du byas pa gang yin pa de ni sgo khyud dkyil 'khor phyed de cha dgu ru ni zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor brgyang dbus ma dang🔽bcas pa ste /
analyzed: sgo khyud dang dkyil 'khor kun dang / sogs @149b pa'i sgras sgo dang sgo 'gram dang logs dang ya phugs ni phyi'i rim pa la ltos nas phyed kyi tshad du byas pa gang yin pa de ni sgo khyud dkyil 'khor phyed de cha dgu ru ni zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor brgyang dbus ma dang bcas pa ste /
translated: The central part of the mandala is included.

original: de rnams la mtshams su dkyil 'khor brkyang nas dkyil 'khor bzhi dor la /
analyzed: de rnams la mtshams su dkyil 'khor brkyang nas dkyil 'khor bzhi dor la /
translated: In those, having extended the mandala to the intermediate directions, four mandalas are omitted.

original: lhag ma lnga rnams su re re zhing dkyil 'khor lngas brgyan par bya'o //
analyzed: lhag ma lnga rnams su re re zhing dkyil 'khor lngas brgyan par bya'o //
translated: The remaining five are each adorned with five mandalas.

original: mthar ni khyams dang ldan par bya ste /
analyzed: mthar ni khyams dang ldan par bya ste /
translated: In the end, it is endowed with a courtyard.

original: de dang mnyam par zhes bya bar spyar ro //
analyzed: de dang mnyam par zhes bya bar spyar ro //
translated: It is equal to that.

original: de bas na don gyi shugs kyis phyi rol gyi rim pa yang mthar khyams dang ldan par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na don gyi shugs kyis phyi rol gyi rim pa yang mthar khyams dang ldan par shes par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, by the force of the meaning, one should understand that the outer area also has a courtyard.

original: gru bzhi pa zhes bya ba ni phyi'i rim pa dang 'dra ba gru bzhi nyid do //
analyzed: gru bzhi pa zhes bya ba ni phyi'i rim pa dang 'dra ba gru bzhi nyid do //
translated: The square is the squareness like the outer area.

original: kha dog lnga dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: kha dog lnga dang yang dag ldan //
translated: Possessing the five colors.

original: zhes bshad pa de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: zhes bshad pa de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to clarify just that, he says:

original: lta ba lnga po zhes bya bal sogs pa gsungs te tshon gyis kha dog bsgyur bar bya'o zhes bya bar spyar ro //
analyzed: lta ba lnga po zhes bya bal sogs pa gsungs te tshon gyis kha dog bsgyur bar bya'o zhes bya bar spyar ro //
translated: The five views, etc. One should color them with colors.

original: mnyam sbyor bas zhes bya ba ni 'brel pas mtshon pa ste de dang spyar ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mnyam sbyor bas zhes bya ba ni 'brel pas mtshon pa ste de dang spyar ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: By the union, etc. The meaning of by the union is by the connection, by that one should color them.

original: ji lta bu'i tshul gyis she na /
analyzed: ji lta bu'i tshul gyis she na /
translated: In what way?

original: kha dog lnga yis so //
analyzed: kha dog lnga yis so //
translated: By the five colors.

original: de bzhin gshegs zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas lnga'i rang bzhin du byas pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas lnga'i rang bzhin du byas pa ste /
translated: The thus-gone is made of the nature of the five buddhas.

original: de nyid kyis na 'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pa shin tu bgrod par dka' ba chen po rab tu bgrod dka' bas so //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na 'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pa shin tu bgrod par dka' ba chen po rab tu bgrod dka' bas so //
translated: By just that, the five views, etc. are the great difficult-to-conquer, very difficult to cross.

original: sangs rgyas lnga zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad dang / mi bskyod ba dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang / 'od dpag tu med pa dang / don yod par grub pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas lnga zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad dang / mi bskyod ba dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang / 'od dpag tu med pa dang / don yod par grub pa ste /
translated: The five buddhas are Vairocana, Akshobhya, Ratnasambhava, Amitabha, and Amoghasiddhi.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi dbum ma dang shar dang lho dang nub dang byang dang rim bzhin du'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi dbum ma dang shar dang lho dang nub dang byang dang rim bzhin du'o //
translated: They are in the center, east, south, west, and north, respectively.

original: kha dog lnga'i zhes bya ba ni kha dog lnga rnams kyis so //
analyzed: kha dog lnga'i zhes bya ba ni kha dog lnga rnams kyis so //
translated: With the five colors means with the five colors.

original: de ting nge 'dzin gyis zhes bya ba ni mnyam par gzhag pas so //
analyzed: de ting nge 'dzin gyis zhes bya ba ni mnyam par gzhag pas so //
translated: By means of meditative concentration means by means of meditative equipoise.

original: ji ltar mdzes par bya ba ni mi mdzes pa la sogs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnams so //
analyzed: ji ltar mdzes par bya ba ni mi mdzes pa la sogs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnams so //
translated: Whatever is beautiful means the adverse side, such as the ugly, etc.

original: mtshams kyi sangs rgyas rnams bsdus pa ni rnam par snang mdzad do //

translated: One becomes like Locana, etc.

original: lha mo'i bsrung ba de dang 'dra bar dbang du gyur pa rnam pa brgyang la sgrub pa po 'jog par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: lha mo'i bsrung ba de dang 'dra bar dbang du gyur pa rnam pa brgyang la sgrub pa po 'jog par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The protection of the goddess is like that, and one should place the adept in the eightfold subjugation.

original: sku la sogs pa'i gsang ba nyid ni gsang ba thams cad do //
analyzed: sku la sogs pa'i gsang ba nyid ni gsang ba thams cad do //
translated: The secret of body, etc. is all secrets.

original: gang gis rgyud 'di rnam par phye ba de la ji ltar na gsang ba'am /
analyzed: gang gis rgyud 'di rnam par phye ba de la ji ltar na gsang ba'am /
translated: How is it that one who has divided this tantra is a secret,

original: gsang chen du 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gsang chen du 'gyur zhe na /
translated: or a great secret?

original: gang gi phyir bsrung bar bya ba ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir bsrung bar bya ba ste /
translated: Because one should protect it.

original: dam tshig dang mi ldan pa rnams la thams cad du ba stan par mi bya ba yin no //
analyzed: dam tshig dang mi ldan pa rnams la thams cad du ba stan par mi bya ba yin no //
translated: One should not teach this to those who do not have the commitments.

original: de bas na rgyud gzhan dag tu spangs pa rnams sgrub pa pos bsrung bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na rgyud gzhan dag tu spangs pa rnams sgrub pa pos bsrung bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, those who have been excluded in other tantras should be protected by the practitioner.

original: bsrungs ba'i phan yon gang zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: bsrungs ba'i phan yon gang zhig yin zhe na /
translated: What is the benefit of protecting?

original: bsrungs na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: bsrungs na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is said, “If one protects…”

original: gsang ba de rtag par kun du  bsrungs na gsang ba de rtsal rnal 'byor pa rnams la 'byung bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no ;
analyzed: gsang ba de rtag par kun du  bsrungs na gsang ba de rtsal rnal 'byor pa rnams la 'byung bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no ;
translated: If one always protects that secret, that secret power will arise for the yogins, not otherwise.

original: / de lta yin na ci'i phyir rnam par phye zhe na /
analyzed: / de lta yin na ci'i phyir rnam par phye zhe na /
translated: If that is so, why is it revealed?

original: yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is for the sake of thorough understanding.

original: yongs su shes pa'i phan yon gang zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: yongs su shes pa'i phan yon gang zhig yin zhe na /
translated: What is the benefit of thorough understanding?

original: dngos po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dngos po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is said, “The thing…”

original: legs par byas pa bsdus pa de ni tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa yin no //
analyzed: legs par byas pa bsdus pa de ni tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa yin no //
translated: That is the completion of the accumulation of good deeds.

original: phyin ci ma log pa'i lta ba ni yang dag pa ma thong ba ste /
analyzed: phyin ci ma log pa'i lta ba ni yang dag pa ma thong ba ste /
translated: The unmistaken view is right view.

original: de gnyis med pa ni ma yin gyi de gnyis 'byor par byed pa nyid las 'byung ste /
analyzed: de gnyis med pa ni ma yin gyi de gnyis 'byor par byed pa nyid las 'byung ste /
translated: Those two are not non-existent, but arise from the very union of those two.

original: de lta bas na gsang ba'i don du gnyer ba rnams kyis yang dag pa'i ye shes ma lus pa 'di la yod pas na gsang ba'i ye shes 'byung zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta bas na gsang ba'i don du gnyer ba rnams kyis yang dag pa'i ye shes ma lus pa 'di la yod pas na gsang ba'i ye shes 'byung zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, since all of the authentic pristine consciousnesses are contained in this, it is called the “arising of the secret pristine consciousness” for those who pursue the secret meaning.

original: gsang ba'i ye shes las byung ba'i rnal 'byor pa ni snga ma lta bu nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: gsang ba'i ye shes las byung ba'i rnal 'byor pa ni snga ma lta bu nyid ma yin te /
translated: The yogi/nī from whom the secret pristine consciousness arises is not like the previous one.

original: de thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur te /
translated: That one will go everywhere.

original: rnal 'byor thams cad la thogs pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnal 'byor thams cad la thogs pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: There will be no impediment in all yogas.

original: tshigs su bcad pas ba stan pa de nyid la tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis bshad pa ba stan pa ni /
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pas ba stan pa de nyid la tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis bshad pa ba stan pa ni /
translated: The explanation of that very verse is taught in two verses.

original: shes rab ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: shes rab ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
translated: The statement “wisdom” and so on is stated.

original: chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i stong pa nyid du snang ba tsam du yang dag par yongs su shes pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i stong pa nyid du snang ba tsam du yang dag par yongs su shes pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the perfect understanding of all phenomena as the mere appearance of nondual emptiness.

original: sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs pas rnam par brtags pa'i lus la ma lus par rgyud ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes @152a * //
analyzed: sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs pas rnam par brtags pa'i lus la ma lus par rgyud ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes @152a * //
translated: The body that is analyzed by means of mantra, mudra and so forth is completely understood in accordance with the tantra.

original: pa ni / thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes te /
analyzed: pa ni / thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes te /
translated: The knowledge of the body that is thoroughly investigated by means of mantras, seals, and so forth, in accordance with the tantra, is the gnosis of the method of meditative concentration.

original: mngon par byang chub pa lnga la sogs pa sbyor ba ste /
analyzed: mngon par byang chub pa lnga la sogs pa sbyor ba ste /
translated: The five manifest enlightenments and so forth are the application.

original: de dag tu brtags pa ni shin tu goms ba ste /
analyzed: de dag tu brtags pa ni shin tu goms ba ste /
translated: The investigation in those is the thorough familiarization.

original: des dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la sogs pa las thams cad las des gang rnam par dag pa ni dngos po de nyid kyis dag par 'gyur te /
analyzed: des dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la sogs pa las thams cad las des gang rnam par dag pa ni dngos po de nyid kyis dag par 'gyur te /
translated: By that, the purification of all activities, such as entering the mandala and so forth, is the purification by that very entity.

original: gsang ba'i de kho na nyid kyi dngos po 'dir yang dngos po yongs su shes pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
analyzed: gsang ba'i de kho na nyid kyi dngos po 'dir yang dngos po yongs su shes pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
translated: Here, the entity of the secret reality is the nature of thoroughly knowing the entity.

original: rnal 'byor pa gang dngos po dag pa de nyid rnal 'byor gyi thob pa bor 'gyur te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa gang dngos po dag pa de nyid rnal 'byor gyi thob pa bor 'gyur te /
translated: The yogin who is pure in that entity will attain the attainment of yoga.

original: thob pa la 'jug par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: thob pa la 'jug par byed pa yin no //
translated: He will enter the attainment.

original: rnal 'byor brtsams pa rnams ni lhun gyis grub par rang gi ro rtag tu 'bab pas dper na lha'i nor bu rtag par rgyun du rang gi 'od kyis snang bar gnas pa yin la /
analyzed: rnal 'byor brtsams pa rnams ni lhun gyis grub par rang gi ro rtag tu 'bab pas dper na lha'i nor bu rtag par rgyun du rang gi 'od kyis snang bar gnas pa yin la /
translated: Those who have begun the yoga are always naturally endowed with their own nectar, like the divine gem which always abides illuminating with its own light.

original: de bzhin du 'di ni rtag tu rang gi 'od kyis bsgom pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'di ni rtag tu rang gi 'od kyis bsgom pa yin no //
translated: Thus, this is always meditated on with one's own light.

original: gzhan du ni gsang ba 'di thams cad su zhig la bshad bar bya zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan du ni gsang ba 'di thams cad su zhig la bshad bar bya zhe na /
translated: But to whom should this secret be explained?

original: rdo rje dbyings ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
translated: The text says vajra realm and so on.

original: 'dir sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i dgyes par mdzad pas na nyams dga' ba ste dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: 'dir sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i dgyes par mdzad pas na nyams dga' ba ste dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Here, the mandala is delightful because it delights the buddhas and bodhisattvas.

original: de yang gang zhig dpal de kho na nyid las gsungs pa'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por dbang bskur ba mkhas pa ste /
analyzed: de yang gang zhig dpal de kho na nyid las gsungs pa'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por dbang bskur ba mkhas pa ste /
translated: Moreover, it is the mandala of the great vajra realm, which is spoken of in the glorious reality, and the expert is the one who has been initiated into it.

original: thos pa mang ba dang / yang dag par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa la thugs kyi gsang ba'i rnal 'byor mchog ni ting nge 'dzin te /
analyzed: thos pa mang ba dang / yang dag par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa la thugs kyi gsang ba'i rnal 'byor mchog ni ting nge 'dzin te /
translated: The supreme yoga of the secret mind is meditative concentration, which is possessed by those who have much learning and who are endowed with correct discrimination.

original: de mkhas pa zhes bya ba bla ma rnams kyis ji skad du gsungs pa'i gsang ba tham cad de /
analyzed: de mkhas pa zhes bya ba bla ma rnams kyis ji skad du gsungs pa'i gsang ba tham cad de /
translated: That is called skillful in all the secrets taught by the gurus.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang bas gang du ji skad du gsungs pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang bas gang du ji skad du gsungs pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That is called secret tantra because it is taught by the Bhagavat Vajradhara.

original: de ston par byed pa'i gzhung la yang ye bar gdags pas ming de skad ces bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de ston par byed pa'i gzhung la yang ye bar gdags pas ming de skad ces bya ba yin no //
translated: It is also called by that name because it is a treatise that teaches that.

original: bcom ldan nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyud //
analyzed: bcom ldan nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyud //
translated: The secret tantra of the Bhagavat

original: mi zad de ni rnam phye ba'i //
analyzed: mi zad de ni rnam phye ba'i //
translated: is explained here in brief🔽with a little commentary

original: tshig nyung dad bas ci nus par //
analyzed: tshig nyung dad bas ci nus par //
translated: to the extent that I am able.🔽By whatever merit I have gained

original: bshad pas bsod nams gang thob pa //
analyzed: bshad pas bsod nams gang thob pa //
translated: by explaining this,🔽may all beings attain the supreme bliss of peace

original: des ni zhi ba'i bde ba mchog / rdo rje can gyi gnas thob nas //
analyzed: des ni zhi ba'i bde ba mchog / rdo rje can gyi gnas thob nas //
translated: and the state of the vajra holder.

original: 'gro ba sdug bsngal dba' 'khyil par //
analyzed: 'gro ba sdug bsngal dba' 'khyil par //
translated: May all beings be freed from the ocean of suffering🔽and attain the state of Vajradhara.

original: dbang med 'khor las 'don par shog / thams cad gsang ba'i bshad sbyor ba //
analyzed: dbang med 'khor las 'don par shog / thams cad gsang ba'i bshad sbyor ba //
translated: The secret explanation of the union of all the secret

original: rin chen 'byung tshig rin chen dngos //
analyzed: rin chen 'byung tshig rin chen dngos //
translated: is the Jewel-source, the Jewel-reality.

original: don rnams shin tu phra ba yang //
analyzed: don rnams shin tu phra ba yang //
translated: Even the most subtle of meanings

original: gsang ba'i sgron mas snang bar byas //
analyzed: gsang ba'i sgron mas snang bar byas //
translated: is illuminated by the lamp of the secret.

original: dpal thams cad gsang ba'i rgyud kyi bshad spyar gsang ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba /
analyzed: dpal thams cad gsang ba'i rgyud kyi bshad spyar gsang ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba /
translated: The secret lamp, called the explanation of the union of all the secret tantras,

original: slob dpon rin chen 'byung @152b gnas zhi bas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: slob dpon rin chen 'byung @152b gnas zhi bas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: is completed.

original: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradzny'a ka ra warma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
analyzed: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradzny'a ka ra warma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
translated: The Indian master Prajñāvarman and the great Tibetan translator-monk Rinchen Zangpo translated, edited, and finalized this text.
